original: ekaṁ samayaṁ bhagavā bhaggesu viharati susumāragire bhesakaḷāvane migadāye.
analyzed: ekam samayam bhagavā bhaggesu viharati susumāra gire bhesakaḷā vane migadāye

original: Atha kho nakulapitā gahapati yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami; upasaṅkamitvā bhagavantaṁ abhivādetvā ekamantaṁ nisīdi. Ekamantaṁ nisinno kho nakulapitā gahapati bhagavantaṁ etadavoca:
analyzed: atha khalu nakula pitā gahapati yena bhagavā tena upasaṅkami upasaṅkamitvā bhagavantam abhivādetvā ekamantam nisīdi ekamantam nisinnaḥ khalu nakula pitā gahapati bhagavantam etat avoca

original: “Ahamasmi, bhante, jiṇṇo vuḍḍho mahallako addhagato vayoanuppatto āturakāyo abhikkhaṇātaṅko.
analyzed: aham asmi bhante jiṇṇaḥ vuḍḍhaḥ mahallakaḥ addha gataḥ vayaḥ anuppattaḥ ātura kāyaḥ abhikkhaṇa ātaṅkaḥ

original: Aniccadassāvī kho panāhaṁ, bhante, bhagavato manobhāvanīyānañca bhikkhūnaṁ.
analyzed: anicca dassāvī kho pana āha bhante bhagavataḥ manaḥ bhāvanīyānam ca bhikkhūna
evam eta gahapati evam eta gahapati

original: Āturo hāyaṁ, gahapati, kāyo aṇḍabhūto pariyonaddho.
analyzed: āturaḥ hāya gahapati kāyaḥ aṇḍa bhūtaḥ pariyonaddhaḥ

original: Yo hi, gahapati, imaṁ kāyaṁ pariharanto muhuttampi ārogyaṁ paṭijāneyya, kimaññatra bālyā?
analyzed: yaḥ hi gahapati imam kāyam pariharantaḥ muhuttam pi ārogyam paṭijāneyya kim aññatra bālyā
tasmā ati ha te gahapati evam sikkhitabba
ātura kāyassa me sataḥ cittam anāturam bhavissati iti

original: Atha kho nakulapitā gahapati bhagavato bhāsitaṁ abhinanditvā anumoditvā uṭṭhāyāsanā
analyzed: atha khalu nakula pitā gahapati bhagavataḥ bhāsitam abhinanditvā anumoditvā uṭṭhāya āsanā

original: bhagavantaṁ abhivādetvā padakkhiṇaṁ katvā yenāyasmā sāriputto tenupasaṅkami; upasaṅkamitvā
analyzed: bhagavantam abhivādetvā padakkhiṇam katvā yena āyasmā sāriputto tena upasaṅkami upasaṅkamitvā

original: āyasmantaṁ sāriputtaṁ abhivādetvā ekamantaṁ nisīdi. Ekamantaṁ nisinnaṁ kho nakulapitaraṁ
analyzed: āyasmantam sāriputtam abhivādetvā ekamantam nisīdi ekamantam nisinnam khalu nakula pitara

original: Alattha no ajja bhagavato sammukhā dhammiṁ kathaṁ savanāyā”ti?
analyzed: alattha naḥ ajja bhagavataḥ sammukhāḥ dhammim katham savanāya ati

original: Idānāhaṁ, bhante, bhagavatā dhammiyā kathāya amatena abhisitto”ti.
analyzed: idānā āha bhante bhagavatā dhammiyā kathāya amatena abhisittaḥ ti

original: “Yathā kathaṁ pana tvaṁ, gahapati, bhagavatā dhammiyā kathāya amatena abhisitto”ti?
analyzed: yathā katham pana tva gahapati bhagavatā dhammiyā kathāya amatena abhisittaḥ ti

original: “Idhāhaṁ, bhante, yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkamiṁ; upasaṅkamitvā bhagavantaṁ abhivādetvā ekamantaṁ nisīdiṁ. Ekamantaṁ nisinno khvāhaṁ, bhante, bhagavantaṁ etadavocaṁ:
analyzed: idha āha bhante yena bhagavā tena upasaṅkami upasaṅkamitvā bhagavantam abhivādetvā ekamantam nisīdi ekamantam nisinnaḥ u khvā aha bhante bhagavantam etat avoca

original: ‘ahamasmi, bhante, jiṇṇo vuḍḍho mahallako addhagato vayoanuppatto āturakāyo abhikkhaṇātaṅko.
analyzed: aham asmi bhante jiṇṇaḥ vuḍḍhaḥ mahallakaḥ addha gataḥ vayaḥ anuppattaḥ ātura kāyaḥ abhikkhaṇa ātaṅkaḥ

original: Aniccadassāvī kho panāhaṁ, bhante, bhagavato manobhāvanīyānañca bhikkhūnaṁ.
analyzed: anicca dassāvī kho pana āha bhante bhagavataḥ manaḥ bhāvanīyānam ca bhikkhūna

original: Evaṁ vutte, maṁ, bhante, bhagavā etadavoca:
analyzed: evam vutte ma bhante bhagavā etat avoca
evam eta gahapati evam eta gahapati

original: Āturo hāyaṁ, gahapati, kāyo aṇḍabhūto pariyonaddho.
analyzed: āturaḥ hāya gahapati kāyaḥ aṇḍa bhūtaḥ pariyonaddhaḥ

original: Yo hi, gahapati, imaṁ kāyaṁ pariharanto muhuttampi ārogyaṁ paṭijāneyya, kimaññatra bālyā?
analyzed: yaḥ hi gahapati imam kāyam pariharantaḥ muhuttam pi ārogyam paṭijāneyya kim aññatra bālyā
tasmā ati ha te gahapati evam sikkhitabba

original: āturakāyassa me sato cittaṁ anāturaṁ bhavissatīti.
analyzed: ātura kāyassa me sataḥ cittam anāturam bhavissati iti

original: Evaṁ khvāhaṁ, bhante, bhagavatā dhammiyā kathāya amatena abhisitto”ti.
analyzed: evam khvā āha bhante bhagavatā dhammiyā kathāya amatena abhisittaḥ iti

original: “Na hi pana taṁ, gahapati, paṭibhāsi bhagavantaṁ uttariṁ paṭipucchituṁ:

original: ‘kittāvatā nu kho, bhante, āturakāyo ceva hoti āturacitto ca, kittāvatā ca pana āturakāyo hi kho hoti no ca āturacitto’”ti?
analyzed: kittāvatā nu kho bhante ātura kāyo ca iva hoti ātura citto ca kittāvatā ca pana ātura kāyaḥ hi kho hoti no ca ātura citto ti

original: “Dūratopi kho mayaṁ, bhante, āgaccheyyāma āyasmato sāriputtassa santike etassa bhāsitassa atthamaññātuṁ.
analyzed: dūratas api kho bhante āgaccheyyāma āyasmataḥ sāriputtassa santike etassa bhāsitassa attham aññātu

original: Sādhu vatāyasmantaṁyeva sāriputtaṁ paṭibhātu etassa bhāsitassa attho”ti.
analyzed: sādhu vata ayasmantayā iva sāriputtam paṭibhātu etassa bhāsitassa atthaḥ ti

original: “Tena hi, gahapati, suṇāhi, sādhukaṁ manasi karohi; bhāsissāmī”ti.
analyzed: tena hi gahapati suṇāhi sādhukam manasi karohi bhāsissāmi iti

original: “Evaṁ, bhante”ti kho nakulapitā gahapati āyasmato sāriputtassa paccassosi.
analyzed: eva bhante iti kho nakula pitā gahapati āyasmataḥ sāriputtassa paccassosi

original: “Kathañca, gahapati, āturakāyo ceva hoti, āturacitto ca?
analyzed: kathañca gahapati ātura kāyaḥ ca iva hoti ātura citto ca

original: Idha, gahapati, assutavā puthujjano ariyānaṁ adassāvī ariyadhammassa akovido ariyadhamme avinīto sappurisānaṁ adassāvī sappurisadhammassa akovido sappurisadhamme avinīto
analyzed: idha gahapati assutavā puthujjanaḥ ariyānam a dassāvī ariya dhammassa a kovidaḥ ariya dhamme a vinītaḥ sappurisānam a dassāvī sappurisa dhammassa a kovidaḥ sappurisa dhamme a vinītaḥ

original: rūpaṁ attato samanupassati, rūpavantaṁ vā attānaṁ; attani vā rūpaṁ, rūpasmiṁ vā attānaṁ.
analyzed: rūpam attataḥ samanupassati rūpavantam vā attāna attani vā rūpa rūpasmin vā attāna
aham mama rūpa nti pariyuṭṭha ṭhāyī hoti

original: Vedanaṁ attato samanupassati, vedanāvantaṁ vā attānaṁ; attani vā vedanaṁ, vedanāya vā attānaṁ.

original: Tassa ‘ahaṁ vedanā, mama vedanā’ti pariyuṭṭhaṭṭhāyino, sā vedanā vipariṇamati aññathā hoti.

original: Tassa ‘ahaṁ saññā, mama saññā’ti pariyuṭṭhaṭṭhāyino, sā saññā vipariṇamati aññathā hoti.

original: Evaṁ kho, gahapati, āturakāyo hoti no ca āturacitto”ti.

original: Attamano nakulapitā gahapati āyasmato sāriputtassa bhāsitaṁ abhinandīti.

original: Atha kho sambahulā pacchābhūmagamikā bhikkhū yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkamiṁsu; upasaṅkamitvā
analyzed: atha kho sambahulāḥ pacchābhūmagamikāḥ bhikkhū yena bhagavā tena upasaṅkamisu upasaṅkamitvā

analyzed: tena kho pana samayena āyasmā sāriputtaḥ bhagavataḥ avidūre aññatarasmin eḷagalāgumbe nisinnaḥ hoti

original: Atha kho te bhikkhū bhagavato bhāsitaṁ abhinanditvā anumoditvā uṭṭhāyāsanā bhagavantaṁ

analyzed: abhivādetvā padakkhiṇam katvā yena āyasmā sāriputto tena upasaṅkamisu upasaṅkamitvā

original: “icchāma mayaṁ, āvuso sāriputta, pacchābhūmaṁ janapadaṁ gantuṁ, pacchābhūme janapade nivāsaṁ kappetuṁ.

original: Ko viññāṇassa assādo, ko ādīnavo, kiṁ nissaraṇan’ti?

original: ‘yaṁ kho rūpaṁ paṭicca uppajjati sukhaṁ somanassaṁ, ayaṁ rūpassa assādo.

original: “Dhammānudhammappaṭipannassa, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno ayamanudhammo hoti yaṁ rūpe dukkhānupassī vihareyya …pe…

original: “Dhammānudhammappaṭipannassa, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno ayamanudhammo hoti yaṁ rūpe anattānupassī vihareyya, vedanāya … saññāya … saṅkhāresu … viññāṇe anattānupassī vihareyya.
analyzed: dhamma anudhamma ppaṭipannassa bhikkhave bhikkhuno ayam anudhammaḥ hoti yam rūpe anatta anupassī vihareyya vedanāya saññāya saṅkhāresu viññāṇe anatta anupassī vihareyya

original: Yo rūpe anattānupassī viharanto …pe… rūpaṁ parijānāti, vedanaṁ … saññaṁ … saṅkhāre
analyzed: yaḥ rūpe anatta anupassī viharantaḥ pe rūpam parijānāti vedanam saññam saṅkhāre

original: … viññāṇaṁ parijānāti, so rūpaṁ parijānaṁ, vedanaṁ … saññaṁ … saṅkhāre … viññāṇaṁ

original: parijānaṁ parimuccati rūpamhā, parimuccati vedanāya, parimuccati saññāya, parimuccati
analyzed: parijānam parimuccati rūpamhā parimuccati vedanāya parimuccati saññāya parimuccati

original: saṅkhārehi, parimuccati viññāṇamhā, parimuccati jātiyā jarāmaraṇena sokehi paridevehi
analyzed: saṅkhārehi parimuccati viññāṇamhā parimuccati jātiyā jarā maraṇena sokehi paridevehi

original: dukkhehi domanassehi upāyāsehi, parimuccati dukkhasmāti vadāmī”ti. Dasamaṁ.
analyzed: dukkhehi domanassehi upāyāsehi parimuccati dukkhasma ati vadāmi iti dasama

original: “Attadīpā, bhikkhave, viharatha attasaraṇā anaññasaraṇā, dhammadīpā dhammasaraṇā anaññasaraṇā.
analyzed: atta dīpāḥ bhikkhave viharatha atta saraṇāḥ an añña saraṇāḥ dhamma dīpāḥ dhamma saraṇāḥ an añña saraṇāḥ

original: Attadīpānaṁ, bhikkhave, viharataṁ attasaraṇānaṁ anaññasaraṇānaṁ, dhammadīpānaṁ dhammasaraṇānaṁ

ki jātikā ca bhikkhave soka parideva dukkha domanassa upāyāsā ki pahotikā

original: Idha, bhikkhave, assutavā puthujjano ariyānaṁ adassāvī ariyadhammassa akovido ariyadhamme avinīto, sappurisānaṁ adassāvī sappurisadhammassa akovido sappurisadhamme avinīto,
analyzed: idha bhikkhave assutavā puthujjanaḥ ariyānam a dassāvī ariya dhammassa a kovidaḥ ariya dhamme a vinītaḥ sappurisānam a dassāvī sappurisa dhammassa a kovidaḥ sappurisa dhamme a vinītaḥ

original: rūpaṁ attato samanupassati, rūpavantaṁ vā attānaṁ; attani vā rūpaṁ, rūpasmiṁ vā attānaṁ.
analyzed: rūpam attataḥ samanupassati rūpavantam vā attāna attani vā rūpa rūpasmin vā attāna

original: Tassa taṁ rūpaṁ vipariṇamati, aññathā ca hoti.

analyzed: vedanam attataḥ samanupassati vedanāvantam vā attāna attani vā vedana vedanāya vā attāna

original: Tassa sā vedanā vipariṇamati, aññathā ca hoti.
analyzed: tassa sā vedanā vipariṇamati aññathā ca hoti

original: viññāṇaṁ attato samanupassati, viññāṇavantaṁ vā attānaṁ; attani vā viññāṇaṁ, viññāṇasmiṁ vā attānaṁ.
analyzed: viññāṇam attataḥ samanupassati viññāṇavantam vā attāna attani vā viññāṇa viññāṇasmin vā attāna

original: Tassa taṁ viññāṇaṁ vipariṇamati, aññathā ca hoti.

tassa viññāṇa vipariṇāma aññathābhāvā uppajjanti soka parideva dukkha domanassa upāyāsā

original: api numāni, bhikkhave, pañca bījajātāni vuddhiṁ virūḷhiṁ vepullaṁ āpajjeyyun”ti?
analyzed: api numāni bhikkhave pañca bīja jātāni vuddhim virūḷhim vepullam āpajjeyyun ti

original: “Imāni cassu, bhikkhave, pañca bījajātāni akhaṇḍāni …pe… sukhasayitāni, pathavī ca assa, āpo ca assa;

original: api numāni, bhikkhave, pañca bījajātāni vuddhiṁ virūḷhiṁ vepullaṁ āpajjeyyun”ti?

analyzed: vedanupayam vā bhikkhave viññāṇam tiṭṭhamānam tiṭṭheyya pe

original: “Tena hi, bhikkhave, suṇātha, sādhukaṁ manasi karotha, bhāsissāmī”ti.

original: “Evaṁ, bhante”ti kho te bhikkhū bhagavato paccassosuṁ.

original: “Tathāgato, bhikkhave, arahaṁ sammāsambuddho anuppannassa maggassa uppādetā, asañjātassa maggassa sañjanetā, anakkhātassa maggassa akkhātā maggaññū, maggavidū, maggakovido;

original: maggānugā ca, bhikkhave, etarahi sāvakā viharanti pacchā samannāgatā.
analyzed: magga anugā ca bhikkhave etarahi sāvakā viharanti pacchā samannāgatā

original: Ayaṁ kho, bhikkhave, viseso, ayaṁ adhippayāso, idaṁ nānākaraṇaṁ tathāgatassa arahato sammāsambuddhassa paññāvimuttena bhikkhunā”ti.

original: Tatra kho bhagavā pañcavaggiye bhikkhū āmantesi:

original: Rūpañca hidaṁ, bhikkhave, attā abhavissa, nayidaṁ rūpaṁ ābādhāya saṁvatteyya, labbhetha ca rūpe:

original: ‘evaṁ me rūpaṁ hotu, evaṁ me rūpaṁ mā ahosī’ti.
analyzed: evam me rūpam hotu evam me rūpam mā ahosi iti

original: Vedanā ca hidaṁ, bhikkhave, attā abhavissa, nayidaṁ vedanā ābādhāya saṁvatteyya, labbhetha ca vedanāya:

original: ‘evaṁ me vedanā hotu, evaṁ me vedanā mā ahosī’ti.
analyzed: evam me vedanā hotu evam me vedanā mā ahosi iti

original: Saṅkhārā ca hidaṁ, bhikkhave, attā abhavissaṁsu, nayidaṁ saṅkhārā ābādhāya saṁvatteyyuṁ, labbhetha ca saṅkhāresu:

original: Viññāṇañca hidaṁ, bhikkhave, attā abhavissa, nayidaṁ viññāṇaṁ ābādhāya saṁvatteyya, labbhetha ca viññāṇe:

analyzed: evam me viññāṇam hotu evam me viññāṇam mā ahosi iti

original: Yasmā ca kho, bhikkhave, viññāṇaṁ anattā, tasmā viññāṇaṁ ābādhāya saṁvattati, na ca labbhati viññāṇe:

original: “Yaṁ panāniccaṁ dukkhaṁ vā taṁ sukhaṁ vā”ti?

original: Evaṁ passaṁ, bhikkhave, sutavā ariyasāvako rūpasmimpi nibbindati, vedanāyapi nibbindati, saññāyapi nibbindati, saṅkhāresupi nibbindati, viññāṇasmimpi nibbindati.

original: “Tayome, bhikkhave, niruttipathā adhivacanapathā paññattipathā asaṅkiṇṇā asaṅkiṇṇapubbā, na saṅkīyanti, na saṅkīyissanti, appaṭikuṭṭhā samaṇehi brāhmaṇehi viññūhi.

original: na tassa saṅkhā ‘atthī’ti, na tassa saṅkhā ‘bhavissatī’ti.

original: Yā vedanā atītā niruddhā vipariṇatā ‘ahosī’ti tassā saṅkhā, ‘ahosī’ti tassā samaññā, ‘ahosī’ti tassā paññatti;
analyzed: yā vedanā atītā niruddhā vipariṇatā ahosi iti tassā saṅkhā ahosi iti tassā samaññā ahosi iti tassā paññatti

original: na tassā saṅkhā ‘atthī’ti, na tassā saṅkhā ‘bhavissatī’ti.
analyzed: na tassā saṅkhā atthi iti na tassā saṅkhā bhavissati iti

original: ye saṅkhārā atītā niruddhā vipariṇatā ‘ahesun’ti tesaṁ saṅkhā, ‘ahesun’ti tesaṁ samaññā, ‘ahesun’ti tesaṁ paññatti;
analyzed: ye saṅkhārāḥ atītāḥ niruddhāḥ vipariṇatāḥ ahesunti tesam saṅkhāḥ ahesunti tesam samaññāḥ ahesunti tesam paññatti

original: na tesaṁ saṅkhā ‘atthī’ti, na tesaṁ saṅkhā ‘bhavissantī’ti.
analyzed: na tesam saṅkhā atthi iti na tesam saṅkhāḥ bhavissanti iti

original: Yaṁ viññāṇaṁ atītaṁ niruddhaṁ vipariṇataṁ, ‘ahosī’ti tassa saṅkhā, ‘ahosī’ti tassa samaññā, ‘ahosī’ti tassa paññatti;
analyzed: yam viññāṇam atītam niruddham vipariṇata ahosi iti tassa saṅkhā ahosi iti tassa samaññā ahosi iti tassa paññatti

original: na tassa saṅkhā ‘atthī’ti, na tassa saṅkhā ‘bhavissatī’ti.
analyzed: na tassa saṅkhā atthi iti na tassa saṅkhā bhavissati iti

original: Yaṁ, bhikkhave, rūpaṁ ajātaṁ apātubhūtaṁ, ‘bhavissatī’ti tassa saṅkhā, ‘bhavissatī’ti tassa samaññā, ‘bhavissatī’ti tassa paññatti;

original: Yā vedanā ajātā apātubhūtā, ‘bhavissatī’ti tassā saṅkhā, ‘bhavissatī’ti tassā samaññā, ‘bhavissatī’ti tassā paññatti;

analyzed: ye saṅkhārāḥ a jātāḥ a pātubhūtāḥ bhavissanti iti tesam saṅkhāḥ bhavissanti iti tesam samaññāḥ bhavissanti iti tesam paññatti

original: ye saṅkhārā jātā pātubhūtā, ‘atthī’ti tesaṁ saṅkhā, ‘atthī’ti tesaṁ samaññā, ‘atthī’ti tesaṁ paññatti;
analyzed: ye saṅkhārāḥ jātā pātubhūtāḥ atthi iti tesam saṅkhā atthi iti tesam samaññā atthi iti tesam paññatti

analyzed: na tesam saṅkhāḥ ahesunti na tesam saṅkhāḥ bhavissanti iti

original: Yaṁ viññāṇaṁ jātaṁ pātubhūtaṁ, ‘atthī’ti tassa saṅkhā, ‘atthī’ti tassa samaññā, ‘atthī’ti tassa paññatti;

original: na tassa saṅkhā ‘ahosī’ti, na tassa saṅkhā ‘bhavissatī’ti.
analyzed: na tassa saṅkhā ahosi iti na tassa saṅkhā bhavissati iti

original: Ime kho, bhikkhave, tayo niruttipathā adhivacanapathā paññattipathā asaṅkiṇṇā asaṅkiṇṇapubbā, na saṅkīyanti, na saṅkīyissanti, appaṭikuṭṭhā samaṇehi brāhmaṇehi viññūhi.
analyzed: ime kho bhikkhave tayo nirutti pathāḥ adhivacana pathāḥ paññatti pathāḥ a saṅkiṇṇāḥ a saṅkiṇṇa pubbāḥ na saṅkīyanti na saṅkīyissanti appaṭikuṭṭhāḥ samaṇehi brāhmaṇehi viññūhi

original: Yepi te, bhikkhave, ahesuṁ ukkalā vassabhaññā ahetukavādā akiriyavādā natthikavādā,
analyzed: ye pi te bhikkhave ahesum ukkalāḥ vassabhaññāḥ a hetuka vādāḥ a kiriya vādāḥ natthika vādāḥ

original: tepime tayo niruttipathe adhivacanapathe paññattipathe na garahitabbaṁ nappaṭikkositabbaṁ amaññiṁsu.
analyzed: te pi ime tayo nirutti pathe adhivacana pathe paññatti pathe na garahitabbam na paṭikkositabbam a maññisu
nindā ghaṭṭana byārosa aupārambha bhaya ati

original: ekaṁ samayaṁ bhagavā sāvatthiyaṁ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
analyzed: ekam samayam bhagavā sāvatthiyam viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme

original: Atha kho aññataro bhikkhu yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami; upasaṅkamitvā bhagavantaṁ abhivādetvā ekamantaṁ nisīdi. Ekamantaṁ nisinno kho so bhikkhu bhagavantaṁ etadavoca:
analyzed: atha kho aññataraḥ bhikkhu yena bhagavā tena upasaṅkami upasaṅkamitvā bhagavantam abhivādetvā ekamantam nisīdi ekamantam nisinnaḥ kho saḥ bhikkhu bhagavantam etat avoca

original: “sādhu me, bhante, bhagavā saṅkhittena dhammaṁ desetu yamahaṁ bhagavato dhammaṁ sutvā eko vūpakaṭṭho appamatto ātāpī pahitatto vihareyyan”ti.
analyzed: sādhu me bhante bhagavā saṅkhittena dhammam desetu yam aham bhagavataḥ dhammam sutvā ekaḥ vūpakaṭṭhaḥ appamattaḥ ātāpī pahitattaḥ vihareyyanti

original: “Yathā kathaṁ pana tvaṁ, bhikkhu, mayā saṅkhittena bhāsitassa vitthārena atthaṁ ājānāsī”ti?
analyzed: yathā katham pana tva bhikkhu mayā saṅkhittena bhāsitassa vitthārena attham ājānāsi iti
rūpam kho bhante upādiyamānaḥ baddhaḥ mārassa

original: Imassa khvāhaṁ, bhante, bhagavatā saṅkhittena bhāsitassa evaṁ vitthārena atthaṁ ājānāmī”ti.
analyzed: imassa khvā āha bhante bhagavatā saṅkhittena bhāsitassa evam vitthārena attham ājānāmi iti

original: Sādhu kho tvaṁ, bhikkhu, mayā saṅkhittena bhāsitassa vitthārena atthaṁ ājānāsi.
analyzed: sādhu kho tva bhikkhu mayā saṅkhittena bhāsitassa vitthārena attham ājānāsi

original: Rūpaṁ kho, bhikkhu, upādiyamāno baddho mārassa;
analyzed: rūpam kho bhikkhu upādiyamānaḥ baddhaḥ mārassa

original: Imassa kho, bhikkhu, mayā saṅkhittena bhāsitassa evaṁ vitthārena attho daṭṭhabbo”ti.
analyzed: imassa kho bhikkhu mayā saṅkhittena bhāsitassa evam vitthārena atthaḥ daṭṭhabbaḥ ti

original: Atha kho so bhikkhu bhagavato bhāsitaṁ abhinanditvā anumoditvā uṭṭhāyāsanā bhagavantaṁ abhivādetvā padakkhiṇaṁ katvā pakkāmi.

original: Yepi te, bhikkhave, rañño nāgā gāmanigamarājadhānīsu, daḷhehi varattehi baddhā, tepi
analyzed: ye pi te bhikkhave raññaḥ nāgāḥ gāma nigama rājadhānīsu daḷhehi va rattehi baddhā te pi

original: ‘iti rūpaṁ, iti rūpassa samudayo, iti rūpassa atthaṅgamo;

original: iti viññāṇaṁ, iti viññāṇassa samudayo, iti viññāṇassa atthaṅgamo’ti.

original: Tesaṁ bhagavantaṁ apassantānaṁ siyā aññathattaṁ siyā vipariṇāmo.
analyzed: tesam bhagavantam a passantānam siyā aññathattam siyā vipariṇāmaḥ

original: Seyyathāpi nāma vacchassa taruṇassa mātaraṁ apassantassa siyā aññathattaṁ siyā vipariṇāmo;
analyzed: seyyathā api nāma vacchassa taruṇassa mātaram a passantassa siyā aññathattam siyā vipariṇāmaḥ

original: evameva santettha bhikkhū navā acirapabbajitā adhunāgatā imaṁ dhammavinayaṁ tesaṁ bhagavantaṁ apassantānaṁ siyā aññathattaṁ siyā vipariṇāmo.
analyzed: evam eva santā ittha bhikkhū navāḥ acira pabbajitāḥ adhunā āgatāḥ imam dhamma vinayam tesam bhagavantam a passantānam siyā aññathattam siyā vipariṇāmo

original: Seyyathāpi nāma bījānaṁ taruṇānaṁ udakaṁ alabhantānaṁ siyā aññathattaṁ siyā vipariṇāmo;
analyzed: sā iyyathā api nāma bījānam taruṇānam udakam a labhantānam siyā aññathattam siyā vipariṇāmaḥ

original: evameva santettha bhikkhū navā acirapabbajitā adhunāgatā imaṁ dhammavinayaṁ, tesaṁ bhagavantaṁ alabhantānaṁ dassanāya siyā aññathattaṁ siyā vipariṇāmo.
analyzed: evam eva santā ittha bhikkhū navāḥ acira pabbajitāḥ adhunā āgatāḥ imam dhamma vinaya tesam bhagavantam a labhantānam dassanāya siyā aññathattam siyā vipariṇāmaḥ

original: Yatheva bhagavatā pubbe bhikkhusaṅgho anuggahito, evameva etarahi anuggaṇhātu bhikkhusaṅghan”ti.
analyzed: yathā iva bhagavatā pubbe bhikkhu saṅghaḥ anuggahitaḥ evam eva etarahi anuggaṇhātu bhikkhu saṅghanti

original: Atha kho brahmā sahampati bhagavato adhivāsanaṁ viditvā bhagavantaṁ abhivādetvā padakkhiṇaṁ katvā tatthevantaradhāyi.
analyzed: atha kho brahmā sahampati bhagavataḥ adhivāsanam viditvā bhagavantam abhivādetvā padakkhiṇam katvā tattha iva antaradhāyi

original: Atha kho bhagavā sāyanhasamayaṁ paṭisallānā vuṭṭhito yena nigrodhārāmo tenupasaṅkami; upasaṅkamitvā paññatte āsane nisīdi.
analyzed: atha kho bhagavā sāyanha samayam paṭisallānā vuṭṭhitaḥ yena nigrodha ārāmaḥ tena upasaṅkami upasaṅkamitvā paññatte āsane nisīdi

original: Nisajja kho bhagavā tathārūpaṁ iddhābhisaṅkhāraṁ abhisaṅkhāsi yathā te bhikkhū ekadvīhikāya sārajjamānarūpā yenāhaṁ tenupasaṅkameyyuṁ.
analyzed: nisajja kho bhagavā tathārūpam iddha abhisaṅkhāram abhisaṅkhāsi yathā te bhikkhū eka dvīhikāya sārajjamāna rūpāḥ yena aham tena upasaṅkameyyu

original: Tepi bhikkhū ekadvīhikāya sārajjamānarūpā yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkamiṁsu; upasaṅkamitvā
analyzed: te api bhikkhū eka dvīhikāya sā rajjamāna rūpāḥ yena bhagavā tena upasaṅkamisu upasaṅkamitvā

original: bhagavantaṁ abhivādetvā ekamantaṁ nisīdiṁsu. Ekamantaṁ nisinne kho te bhikkhū bhagavā etadavoca:
analyzed: bhagavantam abhivādetvā ekamantam nisīdisu ekamantam nisinne kho te bhikkhū bhagavā etat avoca

original: Abhisāpoyaṁ, bhikkhave, lokasmiṁ piṇḍolo vicarasi pattapāṇīti.
analyzed: bhikkhave lokasmin piṇḍolaḥ vicarasi patta pāṇī iti

original: Tañca kho etaṁ, bhikkhave, kulaputtā upenti atthavasikā, atthavasaṁ paṭicca;
analyzed: tat ca kho eta bhikkhave kula puttāḥ upenti atthavasikāḥ atthavasam paṭicca

original: neva rājābhinītā, na corābhinītā, na iṇaṭṭā, na bhayaṭṭā, na ājīvikāpakatā;
analyzed: na iva rāja abhinītā na cora abhinītā na iṇaṭṭā na bhayaṭṭā na ājīvikāpaka tā

original: api ca kho otiṇṇāmha jātiyā jarāya maraṇena sokehi paridevehi dukkhehi domanassehi upāyāsehi dukkhotiṇṇā dukkhaparetā
analyzed: api ca kho otiṇṇāmha jātiyā jarāya maraṇena sokehi paridevehi dukkhehi domanassehi upāyāsehi dukkha utiṇṇā dukkha paretā

original: appeva nāma imassa kevalassa dukkhakkhandhassa antakiriyā paññāyethāti.
analyzed: appā iva nāma imassa kevalassa dukkhakkhandhassa anta kiriyā paññāyetha ati
evam pabbajitaḥ ca āya bhikkhave kula putto

original: So ca hoti abhijjhālu kāmesu tibbasārāgo byāpannacitto paduṭṭhamanasaṅkappo muṭṭhassati asampajāno asamāhito vibbhantacitto pākatindriyo.
analyzed: saḥ ca hoti abhijjhālu kāmesu tibba sārāgaḥ byāpanna cittaḥ paduṭṭha mana saṅkappaḥ muṭṭha sati asampajānaḥ asamāhitaḥ vibbhanta cittaḥ pāka tindriyaḥ

original: Seyyathāpi, bhikkhave, chavālātaṁ ubhatopadittaṁ majjhe gūthagataṁ, neva gāme kaṭṭhatthaṁ pharati, nāraññe kaṭṭhatthaṁ pharati.
analyzed: seyyathā api bhikkhave chava alātam majjhe gūtha gata na iva gāme kaṭṭhattham pharati na araññe kaṭṭhattham pharati

original: Tathūpamāhaṁ, bhikkhave, imaṁ puggalaṁ vadāmi gihibhogā ca parihīno, sāmaññatthañca na paripūreti.
analyzed: tathūpamā āha bhikkhave imam puggalam vadāmi gihi bhogā ca parihīno sāmañña ttham ca na paripūreti
kāma vitakkaḥ byāpāda vitakkaḥ vihisā vitakkaḥ

original: Ime ca bhikkhave, tayo akusalavitakkā kva aparisesā nirujjhanti?
analyzed: ime ca bhikkhave tayo akusala vitakkā kva aparisesā nirujjhanti

original: Catūsu vā satipaṭṭhānesu suppatiṭṭhitacittassa viharato animittaṁ vā samādhiṁ bhāvayato.
analyzed: catūsu vā sati paṭṭhānesu su patiṭṭhita cittassa viharataḥ animittam vā samādhim bhāvayataḥ

original: Yāvañcidaṁ, bhikkhave, alameva animitto samādhi bhāvetuṁ.
analyzed: yāvat cita bhikkhave alam eva animittaḥ samādhi bhāvetu

original: Animitto, bhikkhave, samādhi bhāvito bahulīkato mahapphalo hoti mahānisaṁso.
analyzed: animittaḥ bhikkhave samādhi bhāvitaḥ bahulīkataḥ mahapphalaḥ hoti mahā nisaso
bhava diṭṭhi ca vibhava diṭṭhi ca

original: Tatra kho, bhikkhave, sutavā ariyasāvako iti paṭisañcikkhati:
analyzed: tatra kho bhikkhave sutavā ariya sāvakaḥ iti paṭisañcikkhati

original: ‘atthi nu kho taṁ kiñci lokasmiṁ yamahaṁ upādiyamāno na vajjavā assan’ti?
analyzed: atthi nu kho tam kiñci lokasmim yam aham upādiyamānaḥ na vajjavāḥ assanti

original: ‘natthi nu kho taṁ kiñci lokasmiṁ yamahaṁ upādiyamāno na vajjavā assaṁ.
analyzed: natthi nu kho tam kiñci lokasmim yam aham upādiyamānaḥ na vajjavā assa
aham hi rūpaññā iva upādiyamānaḥ upādiyeyyam vedanaññā iva
saṅkhāreya iva viññāṇaññā iva upādiyamānaḥ upādiyeyya
tassa me assa upādāna paccayā bhavaḥ
jāti paccayā jarā maraṇam soka parideva dukkha domanassa upāyāsā sambhaveyyu
evam etassa kevalassa dukkha kkhandhassa samudayaḥ assa ati
rūpam niccam vā aniccam vā ati

original: “Yaṁ panāniccaṁ dukkhaṁ vā taṁ sukhaṁ vā”ti?
analyzed: yam pana aniccam dukkham vā tam sukham vā ati

original: “Yaṁ panāniccaṁ dukkhaṁ vipariṇāmadhammaṁ kallaṁ nu taṁ samanupassituṁ:
analyzed: yam pana aniccam dukkham vipariṇāma dhammam kallam nu tam samanupassitu
etam mama esaḥ aham asmi esaḥ me attā ati
na aparam itthattāya ati pajānāti iti

original: Ekaṁ samayaṁ bhagavā kosambiyaṁ viharati ghositārāme.
analyzed: ekam samayam bhagavā kosambiyam viharati ghosita ārāme

original: Atha kho bhagavā pubbaṇhasamayaṁ nivāsetvā pattacīvaramādāya kosambiṁ piṇḍāya pāvisi.
analyzed: atha kho bhagavā pubbaṇhasamayam nivāsetvā patta cīvaram ādāya kosambim piṇḍāya pāvisi

original: Kosambiyaṁ piṇḍāya caritvā pacchābhattaṁ piṇḍapātapaṭikkanto sāmaṁ senāsanaṁ saṁsāmetvā
analyzed: kosambiyam piṇḍāya caritvā pacchābhattam piṇḍapāta paṭikkanto sāmam senāsanam sasāmetvā

original: pattacīvaramādāya anāmantetvā upaṭṭhāke anapaloketvā bhikkhusaṅghaṁ eko adutiyo cārikaṁ pakkāmi.
analyzed: patta cīvaram ādāya an āmantetvā upaṭṭhāke an apaloketvā bhikkhu saṅgham ekaḥ adutiyaḥ cārikam pakkāmi

original: Atha kho aññataro bhikkhu acirapakkantassa bhagavato yenāyasmā ānando tenupasaṅkami; upasaṅkamitvā āyasmantaṁ ānandaṁ etadavoca:
analyzed: atha kho aññataraḥ bhikkhu acira pakkantassa bhagavataḥ yena āyasmā ānandaḥ tena upasaṅkami upasaṅkamitvā āyasmantam ānandam etat avoca

original: “esāvuso ānanda, bhagavā sāmaṁ senāsanaṁ saṁsāmetvā pattacīvaramādāya anāmantetvā upaṭṭhāke anapaloketvā bhikkhusaṅghaṁ eko adutiyo cārikaṁ pakkanto”ti.
analyzed: esa āvuso ānanda bhagavā sāmam senāsanam sasāmetvā patta cīvaram ādāya an āmantetvā upaṭṭhāke an apaloketvā bhikkhu saṅgham ekaḥ adutiyaḥ cārikam pakkanto ti

original: “Yasmiṁ, āvuso, samaye bhagavā sāmaṁ senāsanaṁ saṁsāmetvā pattacīvaramādāya anāmantetvā
analyzed: yasmin āvuso samaye bhagavā sāmam senāsanam sasāmetvā patta cīvaram ādāya a nāmantetvā

original: upaṭṭhāke anapaloketvā bhikkhusaṅghaṁ eko adutiyo cārikaṁ pakkamati, ekova bhagavā
analyzed: upaṭṭhāke an apaloketvā bhikkhu saṅgham ekaḥ adutiyaḥ cārikam pakkamati ekaḥ iva bhagavā

original: na bhagavā tasmiṁ samaye kenaci anubandhitabbo hotī”ti.
analyzed: na bhagavā tasmin samaye kenacid anubandhitabbaḥ hoti iti

original: Atha kho bhagavā anupubbena cārikaṁ caramāno yena pālileyyakaṁ tadavasari.
analyzed: atha kho bhagavā anupubbena cārikam caramānaḥ yena pālileyyakam tat avasari

original: Tatra sudaṁ bhagavā pālileyyake viharati bhaddasālamūle.
analyzed: tatra sudam bhagavā pālileyyake viharati bhaddasāla mūle

original: Atha kho sambahulā bhikkhū yenāyasmā ānando tenupasaṅkamiṁsu; upasaṅkamitvā āyasmatā ānandena saddhiṁ sammodiṁsu.
analyzed: atha kho sambahulāḥ bhikkhū yena āyasmā ānandaḥ tena upasaṅkamisu upasaṅkamitvā āyasmatā ānandena saddhim sammodisu

original: Sammodanīyaṁ kathaṁ sāraṇīyaṁ vītisāretvā ekamantaṁ nisīdiṁsu. Ekamantaṁ nisinnā kho te bhikkhū āyasmantaṁ ānandaṁ etadavocuṁ:
analyzed: sammodanīyam katham sāraṇīyam vītisāretvā ekamantam nisīdisu ekamantam nisinnāḥ kho te bhikkhū āyasmantam ānandam etat avocuḥ

original: “cirassutā kho no, āvuso ānanda, bhagavato sammukhā dhammī kathā;
analyzed: cirassutā kho no āvuso ānanda bhagavataḥ sammukhā dhammī kathā

original: icchāma mayaṁ, āvuso ānanda, bhagavato sammukhā dhammiṁ kathaṁ sotun”ti.
analyzed: icchāma mayaḥ āvuso ānanda bhagavataḥ sammukhāḥ dhammim katham sotum ti

original: Atha kho āyasmā ānando tehi bhikkhūhi saddhiṁ yena pālileyyakaṁ bhaddasālamūlaṁ yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami; upasaṅkamitvā bhagavantaṁ abhivādetvā ekamantaṁ nisīdi.
analyzed: atha kho āyasmā ānandaḥ tehi bhikkhūhi saddhim yena pālileyyakam bhaddasāla mūlam yena bhagavā tena upasaṅkami upasaṅkamitvā bhagavantam abhivādetvā ekamantam nisīdi

original: Ekamantaṁ nisinne kho te bhikkhū bhagavā dhammiyā kathāya sandassesi samādapesi samuttejesi sampahaṁsesi.
analyzed: ekamantam nisinne kho te bhikkhū bhagavā dhammiyā kathāya sandassesi samādapesi samuttejesi sampahasesi

original: Tena kho pana samayena aññatarassa bhikkhuno evaṁ cetaso parivitakko udapādi:
analyzed: tena kho pana samayena aññatarassa bhikkhuno evam cetasaḥ parivitakkaḥ udapādi

original: “kathaṁ nu kho jānato kathaṁ passato anantarā āsavānaṁ khayo hotī”ti?
analyzed: katham nu kho jānataḥ katham passataḥ anantarā āsavānam khayaḥ hoti iti

original: Atha kho bhagavā tassa bhikkhuno cetasā cetoparivitakkamaññāya bhikkhū āmantesi:
analyzed: atha kho bhagavā tassa bhikkhuno cetasā cetaḥ pari vitakka maññāya bhikkhū āmantesi

original: Evaṁ vicayaso desito, bhikkhave, mayā dhammo.
analyzed: evam vicayasaḥ desitaḥ bhikkhave mayā dhammaḥ

original: Evaṁ vicayaso desite kho, bhikkhave, mayā dhamme atha ca panidhekaccassa bhikkhuno evaṁ cetaso parivitakko udapādi:
analyzed: evam desite kho bhikkhave mayā dhamme atha ca panidhā ikaccassa bhikkhuno evam cetasaḥ parivitakkaḥ udapādi

original: ‘kathaṁ nu kho jānato kathaṁ passato anantarā āsavānaṁ khayo hotī’ti?
analyzed: katham nu kho jānataḥ katham passataḥ anantarā āsavānam khayaḥ hoti iti

original: Kathañca, bhikkhave, jānato kathaṁ passato anantarā āsavānaṁ khayo hoti?
analyzed: katham ca bhikkhave jānataḥ katham passataḥ anantarā āsavānam khayaḥ hoti

original: Idha bhikkhave, assutavā puthujjano ariyānaṁ adassāvī ariyadhammassa akovido ariyadhamme avinīto, sappurisānaṁ adassāvī sappurisadhammassa akovido sappurisadhamme avinīto
analyzed: idha bhikkhave assutavā puthujjanaḥ ariyānam a dassāvī ariya dhammassa a kovidaḥ ariya dhamme a vinītaḥ sappurisānam a dassāvī sappurisa dhammassa a kovidaḥ sappurisa dhamme a vinītaḥ

original: Yā kho pana sā, bhikkhave, samanupassanā saṅkhāro so.
analyzed: yā kho pana sā bhikkhave samanupassanā saṅkhāraḥ saḥ

original: So pana saṅkhāro kiṁnidāno kiṁsamudayo kiṁjātiko kiṁpabhavo?
analyzed: saḥ pana saṅkhāraḥ ki nidānaḥ ki samudayaḥ ki jātikaḥ ki pabhavaḥ

original: Avijjāsamphassajena, bhikkhave, vedayitena phuṭṭhassa assutavato puthujjanassa uppannā taṇhā;
analyzed: avijjā samphassa jena bhikkhave vedayitena phuṭṭhassa a ssutavataḥ puthujjanassa uppannā taṇhā

original: Iti kho, bhikkhave, sopi saṅkhāro anicco saṅkhato paṭiccasamuppanno.
analyzed: iti kho bhikkhave saḥ api saṅkhāraḥ aniccaḥ saṅkhataḥ paṭicca samuppanno
sā api taṇhā aniccā saṅkhatā paṭicca samuppannā

original: Sāpi vedanā, sopi phasso anicco saṅkhato paṭiccasamuppanno.
analyzed: sā api vedanā saḥ api phassaḥ aniccaḥ saṅkhataḥ paṭicca samuppanno
sā api avijjā aniccā saṅkhatā paṭicca samuppannā

original: Evampi kho, bhikkhave, jānato evaṁ passato anantarā āsavānaṁ khayo hoti.
analyzed: evam pi kho bhikkhave jānataḥ evam passataḥ anantarā āsavānam khayaḥ hoti

original: Na heva kho rūpaṁ attato samanupassati;
analyzed: na ha iva kho rūpam attataḥ samanupassati

original: api ca kho rūpavantaṁ attānaṁ samanupassati.
analyzed: api ca kho rūpavantam attānam samanupassati

original: Yā kho pana sā, bhikkhave, samanupassanā saṅkhāro so.
analyzed: yā kho pana sā bhikkhave samanupassanā saṅkhāraḥ saḥ

original: So pana saṅkhāro kiṁnidāno kiṁsamudayo kiṁjātiko kiṁpabhavo?
analyzed: saḥ pana saṅkhāraḥ ki nidānaḥ ki samudayaḥ ki jātikaḥ ki pabhavaḥ

original: Avijjāsamphassajena, bhikkhave, vedayitena phuṭṭhassa assutavato puthujjanassa uppannā taṇhā;
analyzed: avijjā samphassa jena bhikkhave vedayitena phuṭṭhassa a ssutavataḥ puthujjanassa uppannā taṇhā

original: Iti kho, bhikkhave, sopi saṅkhāro anicco saṅkhato paṭiccasamuppanno.
analyzed: iti kho bhikkhave saḥ api saṅkhāraḥ aniccaḥ saṅkhataḥ paṭicca samuppanno
sā api avijjā aniccā saṅkhatā paṭicca samuppannā

original: Evampi kho, bhikkhave, jānato evaṁ passato anantarā āsavānaṁ khayo hoti.
analyzed: evam pi kho bhikkhave jānataḥ evam passataḥ anantarā āsavānam khayaḥ hoti

original: Na heva kho rūpaṁ attato samanupassati, na rūpavantaṁ attānaṁ samanupassati;
analyzed: na ha iva kho rūpam attataḥ samanupassati na rūpavantam attānam samanupassati

original: api ca kho attani rūpaṁ samanupassati.
analyzed: api ca kho attani rūpam samanupassati

original: Yā kho pana sā, bhikkhave, samanupassanā saṅkhāro so.
analyzed: yā kho pana sā bhikkhave samanupassanā saṅkhāraḥ saḥ

original: So pana saṅkhāro kiṁnidāno kiṁsamudayo kiṁjātiko kiṁpabhavo?
analyzed: saḥ pana saṅkhāraḥ ki nidānaḥ ki samudayaḥ ki jātikaḥ ki pabhavaḥ

analyzed: avijjā samphassa jena bhikkhave vedayitena phuṭṭhassa a ssutavataḥ puthujjanassa uppannā taṇhā

analyzed: iti kho bhikkhave saḥ api saṅkhāraḥ aniccaḥ saṅkhataḥ paṭicca samuppanno
sā api avijjā aniccā saṅkhatā paṭicca samuppannā

analyzed: evam pi kho bhikkhave jānataḥ evam passataḥ anantarā āsavānam khayaḥ hoti

analyzed: na ha iva kho rūpam attataḥ samanupassati na rūpavantam attānam samanupassati na attani rūpam samanupassati

analyzed: api ca kho rūpasmin attānam samanupassati

analyzed: yā kho pana sā bhikkhave samanupassanā saṅkhāraḥ saḥ

analyzed: avijjā samphassa jena bhikkhave vedayitena phuṭṭhassa a ssutavataḥ puthujjanassa uppannā taṇhā

analyzed: iti kho bhikkhave saḥ api saṅkhāraḥ aniccaḥ saṅkhataḥ paṭicca samuppanno

analyzed: tathā aham bhagavatā dhammam desitam ājānāmi yathā khīṇāsavaḥ bhikkhu kāyassa bhedā ucchijjati vinassati na hoti param

original: ‘yo so, āvuso yamaka, bhikkhu arahaṁ khīṇāsavo so kāyassa bhedā paraṁ maraṇā kiṁ hotī’ti?

original: Sammodanīyaṁ kathaṁ sāraṇīyaṁ vītisāretvā ekamantaṁ nisīdiṁsu. Ekamantaṁ nisinnā kho te aññatitthiyā paribbājakā āyasmantaṁ anurādhaṁ etadavocuṁ:

original: “yo so, āvuso anurādha, tathāgato uttamapuriso paramapuriso paramapattipatto, taṁ tathāgato imesu catūsu ṭhānesu paññāpayamāno paññāpeti:

original: ‘hoti tathāgato paraṁ maraṇā’ti vā, ‘na hoti tathāgato paraṁ maraṇā’ti vā, ‘hoti ca na ca hoti tathāgato paraṁ maraṇā’ti vā, ‘neva hoti na na hoti tathāgato paraṁ maraṇā’ti vā”ti?

original: “yo so āvuso tathāgato uttamapuriso paramapuriso paramapattipatto taṁ tathāgato aññatra imehi catūhi ṭhānehi paññāpayamāno paññāpeti:

original: ‘hoti tathāgato paraṁ maraṇā’ti vā, ‘na hoti tathāgato paraṁ maraṇā’ti vā, ‘hoti ca na ca hoti tathāgato paraṁ maraṇā’ti vā, ‘neva hoti na na hoti tathāgato paraṁ maraṇā’ti vā”ti.

original: “so cāyaṁ bhikkhu navo bhavissati acirapabbajito, thero vā pana bālo abyatto”ti.

original: Atha kho aññatitthiyā paribbājakā āyasmantaṁ anurādhaṁ navavādena ca bālavādena ca apasādetvā uṭṭhāyāsanā pakkamiṁsu.

original: “sace kho maṁ te aññatitthiyā paribbājakā uttariṁ pañhaṁ puccheyyuṁ.

original: bhagavato assaṁ, na ca bhagavantaṁ abhūtena abbhācikkheyyaṁ, dhammassa cānudhammaṁ

idha āha bhante bhagavataḥ avidūre arañña kuṭikāyam viharāmi

analyzed: yaḥ saḥ āvuso anurādha tathāgataḥ uttama purisaḥ parama purisaḥ parama patti patto tam tathāgataḥ imesu catūsu ṭhānesu paññāpayamānaḥ paññāpeti

original: “yo so, āvuso, tathāgato uttamapuriso paramapuriso paramapattipatto, taṁ tathāgato aññatra imehi catūhi ṭhānehi paññāpayamāno paññāpeti:

original: Imesu khvāhaṁ, āvuso, pañcasu upādānakkhandhesu na kiñci attaṁ vā attaniyaṁ vā samanupassāmi, na camhi arahaṁ khīṇāsavo;
analyzed: imesu khvā aha āvuso pañcasu upādānakkhandhesu na kiñci attam vā attaniyam vā samanupassāmi na ca amhi araham khīṇa āsavaḥ

original: api ca me, āvuso, pañcasu upādānakkhandhesu ‘asmī’ti adhigataṁ, ‘ayamahamasmī’ti na ca samanupassāmī”ti.
analyzed: api ca me āvuso pañcasu upādānakkhandhesu asmi iti adhigata ayam aham asmi iti na ca samanupassāmi iti

original: “Ehi tvaṁ, āvuso dāsaka, yena khemako bhikkhu tenupasaṅkama; upasaṅkamitvā khemakaṁ bhikkhuṁ evaṁ vadehi:
analyzed: ehi tvaṃ āvuso dāsaka yena khemakaḥ bhikkhu tena upasaṅkama upasaṅkamitvā khemakam bhikkhum evam vadehi

original: yametaṁ, āvuso khemaka, asmīti vadesi, kimetaṁ asmīti vadesi?
analyzed: yam etaḥ āvuso khemaka asmi iti vadesi kim etam asmi iti vadesi

original: Rūpaṁ asmīti vadesi, aññatra rūpā asmīti vadesi,
analyzed: rūpam asmi iti vadesi aññatra rūpā asmi iti vadesi

original: viññāṇaṁ asmīti vadesi, aññatra viññāṇā asmīti vadesi.
analyzed: viññāṇam asmi iti vadesi aññatra viññāṇā asmi iti vadesi

original: Yametaṁ, āvuso khemaka, asmīti vadesi. Kimetaṁ asmīti vadesī’”ti?
analyzed: yam etaḥ āvuso khemaka asmi iti vadesi kim etam asmi iti vadesi iti

original: “Evamāvuso”ti kho āyasmā dāsako therānaṁ bhikkhūnaṁ paṭissutvā yenāyasmā khemako tenupasaṅkami; upasaṅkamitvā āyasmantaṁ khemakaṁ etadavoca—
analyzed: evam āvuso ti kho āyasmā dāsakaḥ therānam bhikkhūnam paṭissutvā yena āyasmā khemako tena upasaṅkami upasaṅkamitvā āyasmantam khemakam etat avoca
yam etaḥ āvuso khemaka asmi iti vadesi kim etam asmi iti vadesi
rūpam asmi iti vadesi aññatra rūpā asmi iti vadesi
viññāṇam asmi iti vadesi aññatra viññāṇā asmi iti vadesi

original: Yametaṁ, āvuso khemaka, ‘asmī’ti vadesi, kimetaṁ ‘asmī’ti vadesī”ti?
analyzed: yam etaḥ āvuso khemaka asmi iti vadesi kim etam asmi iti vadesi iti
ala āvusaḥ dāsaka kim imāya sandhāvanikāya
aham eva yena therāḥ bhikkhū tena upasaṅkamissāmi iti

original: Atha kho āyasmā khemako daṇḍamolubbha yena therā bhikkhū tenupasaṅkami; upasaṅkamitvā therehi bhikkhūhi saddhiṁ sammodi.
analyzed: atha kho āyasmā khemakaḥ daṇḍam olubbha yena therāḥ bhikkhū tena upasaṅkami upasaṅkamitvā therehi bhikkhūhi saddhim sammodi

original: Sammodanīyaṁ kathaṁ sāraṇīyaṁ vītisāretvā ekamantaṁ nisīdi. Ekamantaṁ nisinnaṁ kho āyasmantaṁ khemakaṁ therā bhikkhū etadavocuṁ:
analyzed: sammodanīyam katham sāraṇīyam vītisāretvā ekamantam nisīdi ekamantam nisinnam kho āyasmantam khemakam therāḥ bhikkhū etat avocuḥ
yam etaḥ āvuso khemaka asmi iti vadesi kim etam asmi iti vadesi
rūpam asmi iti vadesi aññatra rūpā asmi iti vadesi
viññāṇam asmi iti vadesi aññatra viññāṇā asmi iti vadesi

original: Yametaṁ, āvuso khemaka, ‘asmī’ti vadesi, kimetaṁ ‘asmī’ti vadesī”ti?
analyzed: yam etaḥ āvuso khemaka asmi iti vadesi kim etam asmi iti vadesi iti

original: “Na khvāhaṁ, āvuso, rūpaṁ ‘asmī’ti vadāmi; napi aññatra rūpā ‘asmī’ti vadāmi.
analyzed: na khvā āha āvuso rūpam asmi iti vadāmi na pi aññatra rūpā asmi iti vadāmi

original: na viññāṇaṁ ‘asmī’ti vadāmi; napi aññatra viññāṇā ‘asmī’ti vadāmi.
analyzed: na viññāṇam asmi iti vadāmi na pi aññatra viññāṇāḥ asmi iti vadāmi

original: Api ca me, āvuso, pañcasu upādānakkhandhesu ‘asmī’ti adhigataṁ ‘ayamahamasmī’ti na ca samanupassāmi.
analyzed: api ca me āvuso pañcasu upādānakkhandhesu asmi iti adhigatam ayam aham asmi iti na ca samanupassāmi

original: Seyyathāpi, āvuso, uppalassa vā padumassa vā puṇḍarīkassa vā gandho.
analyzed: seyyathā api āvuso uppalassa vā padumassa vā puṇḍarīkassa vā gandhaḥ

original: Yo nu kho evaṁ vadeyya: ‘pattassa gandho’ti vā ‘vaṇṇassa gandho’ti vā ‘kiñjakkhassa gandho’ti vā sammā nu kho so vadamāno vadeyyā”ti?
analyzed: yaḥ nu kho evam vadeyya pattassa gandho iti vā vaṇṇassa gandho iti vā kiñjakkhassa gandho iti vā sammā nu kho saḥ vadamānaḥ vadeyya ati
yathā katha pana āvuso sammā byākaramānaḥ byākareyya ati

original: “‘Pupphassa gandho’ti kho, āvuso, sammā byākaramāno byākareyyā”ti.
analyzed: pupphassa gandho ti kho āvuso sammā byākaramānaḥ byākareyya ati

original: “Evameva khvāhaṁ, āvuso, na rūpaṁ ‘asmī’ti vadāmi, napi aññatra rūpā ‘asmī’ti vadāmi.
analyzed: evam eva khvā āha āvuso na rūpam asmi iti vadāmi na pi aññatra rūpāḥ asmi iti vadāmi

original: na viññāṇaṁ ‘asmī’ti vadāmi, napi aññatra viññāṇā ‘asmī’ti vadāmi.
analyzed: na viññāṇam asmi iti vadāmi na pi aññatra viññāṇāḥ asmi iti vadāmi

original: Api ca me, āvuso, pañcasu upādānakkhandhesu ‘asmī’ti adhigataṁ ‘ayamahamasmī’ti na ca samanupassāmi.
analyzed: api ca me āvuso pañcasu upādānakkhandhesu asmi iti adhigatam ayam aham asmi iti na ca samanupassāmi

original: Kiñcāpi, āvuso, ariyasāvakassa pañcorambhāgiyāni saṁyojanāni pahīnāni bhavanti, atha
analyzed: kiñca api āvuso ariya sāvakassa pañca orambhāgiyāni sayojanāni pahīnāni bhavanti atha

original: khvassa hoti: ‘yo ca pañcasu upādānakkhandhesu anusahagato asmīti māno, asmīti chando,
analyzed: khvassa hoti yaḥ ca pañcasu upādānakkhandhesu anusahagataḥ asmi iti mānaḥ asmi iti chando

original: So aparena samayena pañcasu upādānakkhandhesu udayabbayānupassī viharati—
analyzed: saḥ aparena samayena pañcasu upādānakkhandhesu udaya bbaya anupassī viharati

original: iti rūpaṁ, iti rūpassa samudayo, iti rūpassa atthaṅgamo;
analyzed: iti rūpa iti rūpassa samudayaḥ iti rūpassa atthaṅgamaḥ

original: iti viññāṇaṁ, iti viññāṇassa samudayo, iti viññāṇassa atthaṅgamo’ti.
analyzed: iti viññāṇaḥ iti viññāṇassa samudayaḥ iti viññāṇassa atthaṅgamaḥ ti

original: Tassimesu pañcasu upādānakkhandhesu udayabbayānupassino viharato yopissa hoti pañcasu
analyzed: tassa imesu pañcasu upādānakkhandhesu udaya bbaya anupassinaḥ viharataḥ yo pissa hoti pañcasu

original: upādānakkhandhesu anusahagato ‘asmī’ti, māno ‘asmī’ti, chando ‘asmī’ti anusayo asamūhato,
analyzed: upādānakkhandhesu anusahagataḥ asmi iti mānaḥ asmi iti chandaḥ asmi iti anusayaḥ a samūhato

original: Seyyathāpi, āvuso, vatthaṁ saṅkiliṭṭhaṁ malaggahitaṁ. Tamenaṁ sāmikā rajakassa anupadajjuṁ.
analyzed: seyyathā api āvuso vattham saṅkiliṭṭham tam enam sāmikāḥ rajakassa anupadajju

original: Tamenaṁ rajako ūse vā khāre vā gomaye vā sammadditvā acche udake vikkhāleti.
analyzed: tam enam rajakaḥ ūse vā khāre vā gomaye vā sammadditvā acche udake vikkhāleti

original: Kiñcāpi taṁ hoti vatthaṁ parisuddhaṁ pariyodātaṁ, atha khvassa hoti yeva anusahagato ūsagandho vā khāragandho vā gomayagandho vā asamūhato.
analyzed: kiñca api tam hoti vattham parisuddham atha khvassa hoti yā iva anusahagataḥ ūsa gandhaḥ vā khāra gandhaḥ vā gomaya gandhaḥ vā a samūhataḥ

original: Tamenaṁ rajako sāmikānaṁ deti. Tamenaṁ sāmikā gandhaparibhāvite karaṇḍake nikkhipanti.
analyzed: tam enam rajakaḥ sāmikānam deti tam enam sāmikāḥ gandha paribhāvite karaṇḍake nikkhipanti

original: Yopissa hoti anusahagato ūsagandho vā khāragandho vā gomayagandho vā asamūhato, sopi samugghātaṁ gacchati.
analyzed: yaḥ pissa hoti anusahagataḥ ūsa gandhaḥ vā khāra gandhaḥ vā gomaya gandhaḥ vā a samūhataḥ saḥ api samugghātam gacchati

original: Evameva kho, āvuso, kiñcāpi ariyasāvakassa pañcorambhāgiyāni saṁyojanāni pahīnāni
analyzed: evam eva kho āvuso kiñca api ariya sāvakassa pañca orambhāgiyāni sayojanāni pahīnāni

original: bhavanti, atha khvassa hoti yeva pañcasu upādānakkhandhesu anusahagato ‘asmī’ti,
analyzed: bhavanti atha khvassa hoti yā iva pañcasu upādānakkhandhesu anusahagataḥ asmi iti
mānaḥ asmi iti chandaḥ asmi iti anusayaḥ a samūhataḥ

original: So aparena samayena pañcasu upādānakkhandhesu udayabbayānupassī viharati.
analyzed: saḥ aparena samayena pañcasu upādānakkhandhesu udaya bbaya anupassī viharati

original: ‘Iti rūpaṁ, iti rūpassa samudayo, iti rūpassa atthaṅgamo;
analyzed: iti rūpa iti rūpassa samudayaḥ iti rūpassa atthaṅgamaḥ

original: iti viññāṇaṁ, iti viññāṇassa samudayo, iti viññāṇassa atthaṅgamo’ti.
analyzed: iti viññāṇaḥ iti viññāṇassa samudayaḥ iti viññāṇassa atthaṅgamaḥ ti

original: Tassa imesu pañcasu upādānakkhandhesu udayabbayānupassino viharato yopissa hoti pañcasu
analyzed: tassa imesu pañcasu upādānakkhandhesu udaya bbaya anupassinaḥ viharataḥ yopissa hoti pañcasu

original: upādānakkhandhesu anusahagato ‘asmī’ti, māno ‘asmī’ti, chando ‘asmī’ti anusayo asamūhato,
analyzed: upādānakkhandhesu anusahagataḥ asmi iti mānaḥ asmi iti chandaḥ asmi iti anusayaḥ a samūhato

original: Evaṁ vutte, therā bhikkhū āyasmantaṁ khemakaṁ etadavocuṁ:
analyzed: evam vutte therāḥ bhikkhū āyasmantam khemakam etat avocuḥ

original: “na kho mayaṁ āyasmantaṁ khemakaṁ vihesāpekhā pucchimha, api cāyasmā khemako pahosi
analyzed: na kho mayam āyasmantam khemakam vihesa apekhā pucchimha api ca āyasmā khemako pahosi

original: tassa bhagavato sāsanaṁ vitthārena ācikkhituṁ desetuṁ paññāpetuṁ paṭṭhapetuṁ vivarituṁ
analyzed: tassa bhagavataḥ sāsanam vitthārena ācikkhitum desetum paññāpetum paṭṭhapetum vivaritu

original: Tayidaṁ āyasmatā khemakena tassa bhagavato sāsanaṁ vitthārena ācikkhitaṁ desitaṁ paññāpitaṁ paṭṭhapitaṁ vivaritaṁ vibhajitaṁ uttānīkatan”ti.
analyzed: tayā idam āyasmatā khemakena tassa bhagavato sāsanam vitthārena ācikkhitam desitam paññāpitam paṭṭhapitam vivaritam vibhajitam uttānīka tanti

original: Attamanā therā bhikkhū āyasmato khemakassa bhāsitaṁ abhinanduṁ.
analyzed: attamanāḥ therāḥ bhikkhū āyasmataḥ khemakassa bhāsitam abhinandu

original: Imasmiñca pana veyyākaraṇasmiṁ bhaññamāne saṭṭhimattānaṁ therānaṁ bhikkhūnaṁ anupādāya āsavehi cittāni vimucciṁsu, āyasmato khemakassa cāti.
analyzed: imasmin ca pana veyyākaraṇasmiṃ bhaññamāne saṭṭhimattānam therānam bhikkhūnam an upādāya āsavehi cittāni āyasmataḥ khemakassa ca ati

original: Ekaṁ samayaṁ sambahulā therā bhikkhū bārāṇasiyaṁ viharanti isipatane migadāye.
analyzed: ekam samayam sambahulāḥ therāḥ bhikkhū bārāṇasiyam viharanti isipatane migadāye

original: Atha kho āyasmā channo sāyanhasamayaṁ paṭisallānā vuṭṭhito avāpuraṇaṁ ādāya vihārena vihāraṁ upasaṅkamitvā there bhikkhū etadavoca:
analyzed: atha kho āyasmā channo sāyanha samayam paṭisallānā vuṭṭhitaḥ avāpuraṇam ādāya vihārena vihāram upasaṅkamitvā there bhikkhū etat avoca

original: “ovadantu maṁ āyasmanto therā, anusāsantu maṁ āyasmanto therā, karontu me āyasmanto therā dhammiṁ kathaṁ, yathāhaṁ dhammaṁ passeyyan”ti.
analyzed: ovadantu mam āyasmantaḥ therāḥ anusāsantu mam āyasmantaḥ therā karontu me āyasmantaḥ therāḥ dhammim katha yathā aham dhammam passeyyanti

original: Evaṁ vutte, therā bhikkhū āyasmantaṁ channaṁ etadavocuṁ:
analyzed: evam vutte therāḥ bhikkhū āyasmantam channam etat avocuḥ
atha kho āyasmataḥ channassa etat ahosi

original: Sabbe saṅkhārā aniccā, sabbe dhammā anattā’ti.
analyzed: sabbe saṅkhārāḥ aniccā sabbe dhammāḥ anattā ti

original: Atha ca pana me sabbasaṅkhārasamathe sabbūpadhipaṭinissagge taṇhākkhaye virāge nirodhe nibbāne cittaṁ na pakkhandati nappasīdati na santiṭṭhati nādhimuccati.
analyzed: atha ca pana me sabba saṅkhāra samathe sabba upadhi paṭinissagge taṇhā kkhaye virāge nirodhe nibbāne cittam na pakkhandati na pasīdati na santiṭṭhati na adhimuccati
atha kaḥ carahi me attā ati

original: Na kho panevaṁ dhammaṁ passato hoti.
analyzed: na kho pana evam dhammam passataḥ hoti

original: Ko nu kho me tathā dhammaṁ deseyya yathāhaṁ dhammaṁ passeyyan”ti.
analyzed: kaḥ nu kho me tathā dhammam deseyya yathā aham dhammam passeyyanti
atha kho āyasmataḥ channassa etat ahosi

original: “ayaṁ kho āyasmā ānando kosambiyaṁ viharati ghositārāme satthu ceva saṁvaṇṇito sambhāvito
analyzed: ayam kho āyasmai ānandaḥ kosambiyam viharati ghosita ārāme satthu ca iva savaṇṇito sambhāvito

original: ca viññūnaṁ sabrahmacārīnaṁ, pahoti ca me āyasmā ānando tathā dhammaṁ desetuṁ yathāhaṁ dhammaṁ passeyyaṁ;
analyzed: ca viññūnam sabrahmacārīna pahoti ca me āyasmai ānando tathā dhammaṃ desetum yathā aham dhammaṃ passeyya

original: atthi ca me āyasmante ānande tāvatikā vissaṭṭhi.
analyzed: atthi ca me āyasmante ānande tāvatikā
yat nūna aham yena ayasmai ānando tena upasaṅkameyyanti

original: Atha kho āyasmā channo senāsanaṁ saṁsāmetvā pattacīvaramādāya yena kosambī ghositārāmo
analyzed: atha kho āyasmā channo senāsanam patta cīvaram ādāya yena kosambī ghosita ārāmaḥ

original: yenāyasmā ānando tenupasaṅkami; upasaṅkamitvā āyasmatā ānandena saddhiṁ sammodi …pe…
analyzed: yena āyasmai ānandaḥ tena upasaṅkami upasaṅkamitvā āyasmatā ānandena saddhim sammodi pe

original: ekamantaṁ nisinno kho āyasmā channo āyasmantaṁ ānandaṁ etadavoca:
analyzed: ekamantam nisinnaḥ khalu āyasmā channaḥ āyasmantam ānandam etat avoca

original: “Ekamidāhaṁ, āvuso ānanda, samayaṁ bārāṇasiyaṁ viharāmi isipatane migadāye.
analyzed: ekam id āha āvuso ānanda samayam bārāṇasiyam viharāmi isipatane migadāye

original: Atha khvāhaṁ, āvuso, sāyanhasamayaṁ paṭisallānā vuṭṭhito avāpuraṇaṁ ādāya vihārena vihāraṁ upasaṅkamiṁ;
analyzed: atha khvā aha āvuso sāyanha samayam paṭisallānā vuṭṭhitaḥ avāpuraṇam ādāya vihārena vihāram upasaṅkami

original: ‘ovadantu maṁ āyasmanto therā, anusāsantu maṁ āyasmanto therā, karontu me āyasmanto therā dhammiṁ kathaṁ yathāhaṁ dhammaṁ passeyyan’ti.
analyzed: ovadantu mam āyasmantaḥ therāḥ anusāsantu mam āyasmantaḥ therā karontu me āyasmantaḥ therāḥ dhammim katham yathā aham dhammam passeyyanti

original: Evaṁ vutte, maṁ, āvuso, therā bhikkhū etadavocuṁ:
analyzed: evam vutte me āvuso therāḥ bhikkhū etat avocuḥ

original: Sabbe saṅkhārā aniccā, sabbe dhammā anattā’ti.
analyzed: sabbe saṅkhārāḥ aniccā sabbe dhammāḥ anattā ti

original: Sabbe saṅkhārā aniccā, sabbe dhammā anattā’ti.
analyzed: sabbe saṅkhārāḥ aniccā sabbe dhammāḥ anattā ti

original: Atha ca pana me sabbasaṅkhārasamathe sabbūpadhipaṭinissagge taṇhākkhaye virāge nirodhe nibbāne cittaṁ na pakkhandati nappasīdati na santiṭṭhati nādhimuccati.
analyzed: atha ca pana me sabba saṅkhāra samathe sabba upadhi paṭinissagge taṇhā kkhaye virāge nirodhe nibbāne cittam na pakkhandati na pasīdati na santiṭṭhati na adhimuccati
atha kaḥ carahi me attā ati

original: Na kho panevaṁ dhammaṁ passato hoti.
analyzed: na kho pana evam dhammam passataḥ hoti

original: Ko nu kho me tathā dhammaṁ deseyya yathāhaṁ dhammaṁ passeyyanti.
analyzed: kaḥ nu kho me tathā dhammam deseyya yathā aham dhammam passeyyanti

original: ‘ayaṁ kho āyasmā ānando kosambiyaṁ viharati ghositārāme satthu ceva saṁvaṇṇito sambhāvito
analyzed: ayam kho āyasmai ānandaḥ kosambiyam viharati ghosita ārāme satthu ca iva savaṇṇito sambhāvito

original: ca viññūnaṁ sabrahmacārīnaṁ, pahoti ca me āyasmā ānando tathā dhammaṁ desetuṁ yathāhaṁ dhammaṁ passeyyaṁ.
analyzed: ca viññūnam sabrahmacārīna pahoti ca me āyasmai ānando tathā dhammaṃ desetum yathā aham dhammaṃ passeyya

original: Atthi ca me āyasmante ānande tāvatikā vissaṭṭhi.
analyzed: atthi ca me āyasmante ānande tāvatikā
yat nūna aham yena ayasmai ānando tena upasaṅkameyyanti

original: karotu me, āyasmā ānando dhammiṁ kathaṁ yathāhaṁ dhammaṁ passeyyan”ti.
analyzed: karotu me āyasmai ānandaḥ dhammim katham yathā aham dhammam passeyyanti

original: “Ettakenapi mayaṁ āyasmato channassa attamanā api nāma taṁ āyasmā channo āvi akāsi khīlaṁ chindi.
analyzed: ettakena api mayam āyasmataḥ channassa attamanāḥ api nāma tam āyasmā channaḥ āvi akāsi khīlam chindi

original: Atha kho āyasmato channassa tāvatakeneva uḷāraṁ pītipāmojjaṁ uppajji:
analyzed: atha kho āyasmataḥ channassa tāvatakena iva uḷāram pīti pāmojjam uppajji

original: “Sammukhā metaṁ, āvuso channa, bhagavato sutaṁ, sammukhā paṭiggahitaṁ kaccānagottaṁ bhikkhuṁ ovadantassa—
analyzed: sammukhā mā itas āvuso channa bhagavataḥ suta sammukhā paṭiggahitam kaccāna gottam bhikkhum ovadantassa

original: dvayanissito khvāyaṁ, kaccāna, loko yebhuyyena atthitañceva natthitañca.
analyzed: dvaya nissitaḥ khvāya kaccāna lokaḥ yebhuyyena atthitañca iva na atthitañca

original: Lokasamudayaṁ kho, kaccāna, yathābhūtaṁ sammappaññāya passato yā loke natthitā, sā na hoti.
analyzed: loka samudayam kho kaccāna yathābhūtam sammappaññāya passataḥ yā loke na atthitā sā na hoti

original: Lokanirodhaṁ kho, kaccāna, yathābhūtaṁ sammappaññāya passato yā loke atthitā, sā na hoti.
analyzed: loka nirodham kho kaccāna yathābhūtam sammappaññāya passataḥ yā loke atthitā sā na hoti

original: taṁ cāyaṁ upayupādānaṁ cetaso adhiṭṭhānābhinivesānusayaṁ na upeti na upādiyati nādhiṭṭhāti ‘attā me’ti.
analyzed: tam ca ayam cetasaḥ adhiṭṭhāna abhinivesa anusayam na upeti na upādiyati na adhiṭṭhāti attā mā iti

original: Dukkhameva uppajjamānaṁ uppajjati, dukkhaṁ nirujjhamānaṁ nirujjhatīti na kaṅkhati na vicikicchati.
analyzed: dukkham eva uppajjamānam uppajjati dukkham nirujjhamānam nirujjhati iti na kaṅkhati na vicikicchati
apara ppaccayā ñāṇam evassa ettha hoti
sabbam atthi iti kho kaccāna ayam ekaḥ antaḥ
sabbam na atthi iti ayam dutiyaḥ antaḥ

original: Ete te, kaccāna, ubho ante anupagamma majjhena tathāgato dhammaṁ deseti—
analyzed: ete te kaccāna ubho ante an upagamma majjhena tathāgataḥ dhammam deseti
evam etassa kevalassa dukkha kkhandhassa samudayaḥ hoti
avijjāya tu eva asesa virāga nirodhā saṅkhāra nirodho pe
evam etassa kevalassa dukkhakkhandhassa nirodhaḥ hoti iti

original: “Evametaṁ, āvuso ānanda, hoti yesaṁ āyasmantānaṁ tādisā sabrahmacārayo anukampakā atthakāmā ovādakā anusāsakā.
analyzed: evam ete āvuso ānanda hoti yesam āyasmantānam tādisāḥ sabrahmacārayaḥ anukampakāḥ attha kāmāḥ ovādakāḥ anusāsakā

original: Idañca pana me āyasmato ānandassa dhammadesanaṁ sutvā dhammo abhisamito”ti.
analyzed: idam ca pana me āyasmataḥ ānandassa dhamma desanam sutvā dhammo abhisamito ti

original: Atha kho āyasmā rāhulo yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami; upasaṅkamitvā …pe… ekamantaṁ nisinno kho āyasmā rāhulo bhagavantaṁ etadavoca:
analyzed: atha khalu āyasmā rāhulaḥ yena bhagavā tena upasaṅkami upasaṅkamitvā pe ekamantam nisinnaḥ khalu āyasmā rāhulaḥ bhagavantam etat avoca

original: “kathaṁ nu kho, bhante, jānato kathaṁ passato imasmiñca saviññāṇake kāye bahiddhā ca sabbanimittesu ahaṅkāramamaṅkāramānānusayā na hontī”ti?
analyzed: katham nu kho bhante jānato katham passato imasmin ca sa viññāṇake kāye bahiddhā ca sabba nimittesu ahaṅkāra mamaṅkāra māna anusayāḥ na honti iti

original: “Yaṁ kiñci, rāhula, rūpaṁ atītānāgatapaccuppannaṁ ajjhattaṁ vā bahiddhā vā oḷārikaṁ
analyzed: yam kiñci rāhula rūpam atīta anāgata paccuppannam ajjhattam vā bahiddhā vā oḷārika

analyzed: vā sukhumam vā hīnam vā paṇītam vā yam dūre santike vā sabbam rūpam na itam mama

original: nesohamasmi, na meso attā’ti evametaṁ yathābhūtaṁ sammappaññāya passati.
analyzed: na iso ham asmi na mā iso attā ati evam etam yathābhūtam sammappaññāya passati

original: yaṁ kiñci viññāṇaṁ atītānāgatapaccuppannaṁ ajjhattaṁ vā bahiddhā vā …pe…
analyzed: yam kiñci viññāṇam atīta anāgata paccuppannam ajjhattam vā bahiddhā vā pe

original: Evaṁ kho, rāhula, jānato evaṁ passato imasmiñca saviññāṇake kāye bahiddhā ca sabbanimittesu ahaṅkāramamaṅkāramānānusayā na hontī”ti.
analyzed: evam kho rāhula jānataḥ evam passataḥ imasmin ca sa viññāṇake kāye bahiddhā ca sabba nimittesu ahaṅkāra mamaṅkāra māna anusayāḥ na honti iti

original: Ekamantaṁ nisinno kho āyasmā rāhulo bhagavantaṁ etadavoca:

original: “kathaṁ nu kho, bhante, jānato kathaṁ passato imasmiñca saviññāṇake kāye bahiddhā
analyzed: katham nu kho bhante jānato katham passato imasmin ca sa viññāṇake kāye bahiddhā

original: ca sabbanimittesu ahaṅkāramamaṅkāramānāpagataṁ mānasaṁ hoti vidhāsamatikkantaṁ santaṁ suvimuttan”ti?

original: yaṁ kiñci viññāṇaṁ atītānāgatapaccuppannaṁ ajjhattaṁ vā bahiddhā vā oḷārikaṁ vā sukhumaṁ

original: Evaṁ kho, rāhula, jānato evaṁ passato imasmiñca saviññāṇake kāye bahiddhā ca sabbanimittesu ahaṅkāramamaṅkāramānāpagataṁ mānasaṁ hoti vidhāsamatikkantaṁ santaṁ suvimuttan”ti.
analyzed: evam kho rāhula jānataḥ evam passataḥ imasmin ca sa viññāṇake kāye bahiddhā ca sabba nimittesu ahaṅkāra mamaṅkāra māna apagatam mānasam hoti vidhāsam atikkantam santam su vimuttam ti

original: “Seyyathāpi, bhikkhave, nadī pabbateyyā ohārinī dūraṅgamā sīghasotā. Tassā ubhosu

original: tīresu kāsā cepi jātā assu, te naṁ ajjholambeyyuṁ; kusā cepi jātā assu, te naṁ ajjholambeyyuṁ;
analyzed: tīresu kāsā cepi jātāḥ assu te nam ajjholambeyyu kusā cepi jātāḥ assu te nam ajjholambeyyu

original: pabbajā cepi jātā assu, te naṁ ajjholambeyyuṁ; bīraṇā cepi jātā assu, te naṁ ajjholambeyyuṁ;
analyzed: pabbajāḥ ce ipi jātāḥ assu te nam ajjholambeyyu bīraṇāḥ ce ipi jātāḥ assu te nam ajjholambeyyu

original: rukkhā cepi jātā assu, te naṁ ajjholambeyyuṁ. Tassā puriso sotena vuyhamāno kāse
analyzed: rukkhā ce pi jātāḥ assu te nam ajjholambeyyu tassā puriso sotena vuyhamāno kāse

na aparam itthattāya ati pajānāti iti

analyzed: tam enam cakkhumā puriso passeyya nijjhāyeyya yonisaḥ upaparikkheyya tassa tam passato

original: nijjhāyato yoniso upaparikkhato rittakaññeva khāyeyya, tucchakaññeva khāyeyya …pe…
analyzed: nijjhāyataḥ yonisaḥ upaparikkhataḥ ritta kaññā iva khāyeyya tuccha kaññā iva khāyeyya pe
kim hi siyā bhikkhave marīcikāya sāro

original: Evameva kho, bhikkhave, yā kāci saññā …pe….
analyzed: evam eva kho bhikkhave yā kāci saññā pe

original: Seyyathāpi, bhikkhave, puriso sāratthiko sāragavesī sārapariyesanaṁ caramāno tiṇhaṁ
analyzed: seyyathā api bhikkhave purisaḥ sāratthikaḥ sāra gavesī sāra pariyesanam caramānaḥ

original: kuṭhāriṁ ādāya vanaṁ paviseyya. So tattha passeyya mahantaṁ kadalikkhandhaṁ ujuṁ
analyzed: kuṭhārim ādāya vanam paviseyya saḥ tattha passeyya mahantam kadali kkhandham uju

original: navaṁ akukkukajātaṁ. Tamenaṁ mūle chindeyya; mūle chetvā agge chindeyya, agge chetvā
analyzed: navam a kukkuka jāta tam enam mūle chindeyya mūle chetvā agge chindeyya agge chetvā

original: pattavaṭṭiṁ vinibbhujeyya. So tassa pattavaṭṭiṁ vinibbhujanto pheggumpi nādhigaccheyya,
analyzed: patta vaṭṭim vinibbhujeyya so tassa patta vaṭṭim vinibbhujantaḥ pheggum pi na adhigaccheyya

original: kuto sāraṁ. Tamenaṁ cakkhumā puriso passeyya nijjhāyeyya yoniso upaparikkheyya. Tassa
analyzed: kutas sāra tam enam cakkhumā puriso passeyya nijjhāyeyya yonisaḥ upaparikkheyya tassa

original: taṁ passato nijjhāyato yoniso upaparikkhato rittakaññeva khāyeyya, tucchakaññeva
analyzed: tam passataḥ nijjhāyataḥ yonisaḥ upaparikkhataḥ ritta kaññā iva khāyeyya tuccha kaññā iva

original: khāyeyya, asārakaññeva khāyeyya. Kiñhi siyā, bhikkhave, kadalikkhandhe sāro?
analyzed: khāyeyya asāra kaññā iva khāyeyya kiñhi siyā bhikkhave kadali kkhandhe sāraḥ

original: Evameva kho, bhikkhave, ye keci saṅkhārā atītānāgatapaccuppannā …pe… ye dūre santike
analyzed: evam eva kho bhikkhave ye keci saṅkhārāḥ atīta anāgata paccuppannāḥ pe ye dūre santike

original: vā taṁ bhikkhu passati nijjhāyati yoniso upaparikkhati. Tassa taṁ passato nijjhāyato
analyzed: vā tam bhikkhu passati nijjhāyati yonisas upaparikkhati tassa tam passataḥ nijjhāyataḥ

original: yoniso upaparikkhato rittakaññeva khāyati, tucchakaññeva khāyati, asārakaññeva khāyati.
analyzed: yonisaḥ upaparikkhato ritta kaññā iva khāyati tuccha kaññā iva khāyati asāra kaññā iva khāyati
kim hi siyā bhikkhave saṅkhāresu sāraḥ

original: Seyyathāpi, bhikkhave, māyākāro vā māyākārantevāsī vā catumahāpathe māyaṁ vidaṁseyya.
analyzed: seyyathā api bhikkhave māyākāraḥ vā māyākāra antevāsī vā catu mahāpathe mā ayam vidaseyya

original: Tamenaṁ cakkhumā puriso passeyya nijjhāyeyya yoniso upaparikkheyya. Tassa taṁ passato
analyzed: tam enam cakkhumā puriso passeyya nijjhāyeyya yonisaḥ upaparikkheyya tassa tam passato

original: nijjhāyato yoniso upaparikkhato rittakaññeva khāyeyya, tucchakaññeva khāyeyya, asārakaññeva
analyzed: nijjhāyataḥ yonisaḥ upaparikkhataḥ ritta kaññā iva khāyeyya tuccha kaññā iva khāyeyya asāra kaññā iva

original: khāyeyya. Kiñhi siyā, bhikkhave, māyāya sāro?
analyzed: khāyeyya kiñhi siyā bhikkhave māyāya sāraḥ

original: Evameva kho, bhikkhave, yaṁ kiñci viññāṇaṁ atītānāgatapaccuppannaṁ …pe… yaṁ dūre
analyzed: evam eva kho bhikkhave yam kiñci viññāṇam atīta anāgata paccuppannam pe yam dūre

original: santike vā, taṁ bhikkhu passati nijjhāyati yoniso upaparikkhati. Tassa taṁ passato
analyzed: santike vā tam bhikkhu passati nijjhāyati yonisas upaparikkhati tassa tam passato

original: nijjhāyato yoniso upaparikkhato rittakaññeva khāyati, tucchakaññeva khāyati, asārakaññeva
analyzed: nijjhāyataḥ yonisaḥ upaparikkhataḥ ritta kaññā iva khāyati tuccha kaññā iva khāyati asāra kaññā iva

original: khāyati. Kiñhi siyā, bhikkhave, viññāṇe sāro?
analyzed: khāyati kim hi siyā bhikkhave viññāṇe sāraḥ

original: Evaṁ passaṁ, bhikkhave, sutavā ariyasāvako rūpasmimpi nibbindati, vedanāyapi … saññāyapi … saṅkhāresupi … viññāṇasmimpi nibbindati.
analyzed: evam passa bhikkhave sutavā ariya sāvako rūpasmim pi nibbindati vedanāya api saññāya api saṅkhāresu pi viññāṇasmim pi nibbindati

original: Nibbindaṁ virajjati; virāgā vimuccati. Vimuttasmiṁ vimuttamiti ñāṇaṁ hoti …pe…
analyzed: nibbindam virajjati virāgā vimuccati vimuttasmin vimuttam iti ñāṇam hoti pe

original: Idaṁ vatvāna sugato athāparaṁ etadavoca satthā:
analyzed: idam vatvāna sugataḥ atha aparam etat avoca satthā

original: Ekamantaṁ nisinno kho so bhikkhu bhagavantaṁ etadavoca:
analyzed: ekamantam nisinnaḥ kho saḥ bhikkhu bhagavantam etat avoca

original: “atthi nu kho, bhante, kiñci rūpaṁ yaṁ rūpaṁ niccaṁ dhuvaṁ sassataṁ avipariṇāmadhammaṁ sassatisamaṁ tatheva ṭhassati?
analyzed: atthi nu kho bhante kiñci rūpam yat rūpam niccam dhuvam sassatam a vipariṇāma dhammam sassati samam tathā iva

original: Atthi nu kho, bhante, kāci vedanā yā vedanā niccā dhuvā sassatā avipariṇāmadhammā sassatisamaṁ tatheva ṭhassati?
analyzed: atthi nu kho bhante kāci vedanā yā vedanā niccā dhuvā sassatā a vipariṇāma dhammā sassati samam tathā iva ṭhassati

original: Atthi nu kho, bhante, kāci saññā yā saññā …pe…
analyzed: atthi nu kho bhante kāci saññā yā saññā pe

original: atthi nu kho, bhante, keci saṅkhārā ye saṅkhārā niccā dhuvā sassatā avipariṇāmadhammā sassatisamaṁ tatheva ṭhassanti?
analyzed: atthi nu kho bhante keci saṅkhārāḥ ye saṅkhārāḥ niccāḥ dhuvāḥ sassatāḥ a vipariṇāma dhammāḥ sassati samam tathā iva

original: Atthi nu kho, bhante, kiñci viññāṇaṁ, yaṁ viññāṇaṁ niccaṁ dhuvaṁ sassataṁ avipariṇāmadhammaṁ sassatisamaṁ tatheva ṭhassatī”ti?
analyzed: atthi nu kho bhante kiñci viññāṇa yat viññāṇam niccam dhuvam sassatam a vipariṇāma dhammam sassati samam tathā iva ṭhassati iti

original: “Natthi kho, bhikkhu, kiñci rūpaṁ, yaṁ rūpaṁ niccaṁ dhuvaṁ sassataṁ avipariṇāmadhammaṁ sassatisamaṁ tatheva ṭhassati.
analyzed: natthi kho bhikkhu kiñci yat rūpam niccam dhuvam sassatam a vipariṇāma dhammam sassati samam tathā iva

original: kiñci viññāṇaṁ, yaṁ viññāṇaṁ niccaṁ dhuvaṁ sassataṁ avipariṇāmadhammaṁ sassatisamaṁ tatheva ṭhassatī”ti.
analyzed: yam viññāṇam niccam dhuvam sassatam a vipariṇāma dhammam sassati samam tathā iva

original: Atha kho bhagavā parittaṁ gomayapiṇḍaṁ pāṇinā gahetvā taṁ bhikkhuṁ etadavoca:
analyzed: atha kho bhagavā parittam gomaya piṇḍam pāṇinā gahetvā tam bhikkhum etat avoca

original: “ettakopi kho, bhikkhu, attabhāvapaṭilābho natthi nicco dhuvo sassato avipariṇāmadhammo sassatisamaṁ tatheva ṭhassati.
analyzed: ettakaḥ api kho bhikkhu atta bhāva paṭilābhaḥ natthi niccaḥ dhuvaḥ sassataḥ a vipariṇāma dhammo sassati samam tathā iva

original: Ettako cepi, bhikkhu, attabhāvapaṭilābho abhavissa nicco dhuvo sassato avipariṇāmadhammo, nayidaṁ brahmacariyavāso paññāyetha sammā dukkhakkhayāya.
analyzed: ettako ce pi bhikkhu atta bhāva paṭilābhaḥ abhavissa niccaḥ dhuvaḥ sassataḥ a vipariṇāma dhammo na yidam brahmacariya vāso paññāyetha sammā dukkha kkhayāya

original: Yasmā ca kho, bhikkhu, ettakopi attabhāvapaṭilābho natthi nicco dhuvo sassato avipariṇāmadhammo, tasmā brahmacariyavāso paññāyati sammā dukkhakkhayāya.
analyzed: yasmā ca kho bhikkhu ettakaḥ api atta bhāva paṭilābhaḥ natthi niccaḥ dhuvaḥ sassataḥ a vipariṇāma dhammo tasmā brahmacariya vāso paññāyati sammā dukkha kkhayāya

original: Bhūtapubbāhaṁ, bhikkhu, rājā ahosiṁ khattiyo muddhāvasitto.
analyzed: bhūta pubbā aha bhikkhu rājā ahosim khattiyaḥ muddhāvasittaḥ

original: Tassa mayhaṁ, bhikkhu, rañño sato khattiyassa muddhāvasittassa caturāsītinagarasahassāni ahesuṁ kusāvatīrājadhānippamukhāni.
analyzed: tassa bhikkhu raññaḥ sataḥ khattiyassa muddhāvasittassa caturāsīti nagara sahassāni ahesum kusāvatī rājadhāni ppamukhāni

original: Tassa mayhaṁ, bhikkhu, rañño sato khattiyassa muddhāvasittassa caturāsītipāsādasahassāni ahesuṁ dhammapāsādappamukhāni.
analyzed: tassa bhikkhu raññaḥ sataḥ khattiyassa muddhāvasittassa caturāsīti pāsāda sahassāni ahesum dhamma pāsāda ppamukhāni

original: Tassa mayhaṁ, bhikkhu, rañño sato khattiyassa muddhāvasittassa caturāsītikūṭāgārasahassāni ahesuṁ mahābyūhakūṭāgārappamukhāni.
analyzed: tassa bhikkhu raññaḥ sataḥ khattiyassa muddhāvasittassa caturāsīti kūṭāgāra sahassāni ahesum mahā byūha kūṭāgāra ppamukhāni

original: Tassa mayhaṁ, bhikkhu, rañño sato khattiyassa muddhāvasittassa caturāsītipallaṅkasahassāni
analyzed: tassa bhikkhu raññaḥ sataḥ khattiyassa muddhāvasittassa catur āsīti pallaṅka sahassāni

original: ahesuṁ dantamayāni sāramayāni sovaṇṇamayāni goṇakatthatāni paṭikatthatāni paṭalikatthatāni
analyzed: ahesum danta mayāni sāra mayāni sovaṇṇa mayāni goṇakatthatāni paṭikatthatāni paṭalikatthatāni
kadali miga pavara paccattharaṇāni sa uttaracchadāni ubhatolohita kūpa dhānāni

original: Tassa mayhaṁ, bhikkhu, rañño sato khattiyassa muddhāvasittassa caturāsītināgasahassāni ahesuṁ sovaṇṇālaṅkārāni sovaṇṇaddhajāni hemajālapaṭicchannāni uposathanāgarājappamukhāni.
analyzed: tassa bhikkhu raññaḥ sataḥ khattiyassa muddhāvasittassa caturāsīti nāga sahassāni ahesum sovaṇṇa alaṅkārāni sovaṇṇa ddhajāni hema jāla paṭicchannāni uposatha nāga rāja ppamukhāni

original: Tassa mayhaṁ, bhikkhu, rañño sato khattiyassa muddhāvasittassa caturāsītiassasahassāni ahesuṁ sovaṇṇālaṅkārāni sovaṇṇaddhajāni hemajālapaṭicchannāni valāhakaassarājappamukhāni.
analyzed: tassa bhikkhu raññaḥ sataḥ khattiyassa muddhāvasittassa caturāsīti assa sahassāni ahesum sovaṇṇa alaṅkārāni sovaṇṇa ddhajāni hema jāla paṭicchannāni valāhaka assa rāja ppamukhāni

original: Tassa mayhaṁ, bhikkhu, rañño sato khattiyassa muddhāvasittassa caturāsītirathasahassāni ahesuṁ sovaṇṇālaṅkārāni sovaṇṇaddhajāni hemajālapaṭicchannāni vejayantarathappamukhāni.
analyzed: tassa bhikkhu raññaḥ sataḥ khattiyassa muddhāvasittassa caturāsīti ratha sahassāni ahesum sovaṇṇa alaṅkārāni sovaṇṇa ddhajāni hema jāla paṭicchannāni vejayanta ratha ppamukhāni

original: Tassa mayhaṁ, bhikkhu, rañño sato khattiyassa muddhāvasittassa caturāsītimaṇisahassāni ahesuṁ maṇiratanappamukhāni.
analyzed: tassa bhikkhu raññaḥ sataḥ khattiyassa muddhāvasittassa caturāsīti maṇi sahassāni ahesum maṇi ratana ppamukhāni

original: Tassa mayhaṁ, bhikkhu …pe… caturāsītiitthisahassāni ahesuṁ subhaddādevippamukhāni.
analyzed: tassa bhikkhu pe caturāsīti itthi sahassāni ahesum subhaddā devi ppamukhāni

original: Tassa mayhaṁ, bhikkhu …pe… caturāsītikhattiyasahassāni ahesuṁ anuyantāni pariṇāyakaratanappamukhāni.
analyzed: tassa bhikkhu pe caturāsīti khattiya sahassāni ahesuṃ anuyantāni pariṇāyaka ratana ppamukhāni

original: Tassa mayhaṁ, bhikkhu …pe… caturāsītidhenusahassāni ahesuṁ dukūlasandānāni kaṁsūpadhāraṇāni.
analyzed: tassa bhikkhu pe caturāsīti dhenu sahassāni ahesum dukūla sandānāni kasūpadhāraṇāni

original: Tassa mayhaṁ, bhikkhu …pe… caturāsītivatthakoṭisahassāni ahesuṁ khomasukhumāni koseyyasukhumāni kambalasukhumāni kappāsikasukhumāni.
analyzed: tassa bhikkhu pe caturāsīti vattha koṭi sahassāni ahesum khoma sukhumāni koseyya sukhumāni kambala sukhumāni kappāsika sukhumāni

original: Tassa mayhaṁ, bhikkhu …pe… caturāsītithālipākasahassāni ahesuṁ; sāyaṁ pātaṁ bhattābhihāro abhihariyittha.
analyzed: tassa bhikkhu pe catur āsīti thālipāka sahassāni ahesu sāyam pātam bhattābhihāraḥ

original: Tesaṁ kho pana, bhikkhu, caturāsītiyā nagarasahassānaṁ ekaññeva taṁ nagaraṁ hoti yamahaṁ tena samayena ajjhāvasāmi—kusāvatī rājadhānī.
analyzed: tesam kho pana bhikkhu caturāsītiyā nagara sahassānam ekaññā iva tat nagaram hoti yam aham tena samayena ajjhāvasāmi kusāvatī rājadhānī

original: Tesaṁ kho pana, bhikkhu, caturāsītiyā pāsādasahassānaṁ ekoyeva so pāsādo hoti yamahaṁ tena samayena ajjhāvasāmi—dhammo pāsādo.
analyzed: tesam kho pana bhikkhu caturāsītiyā pāsāda sahassānaṃ ekaḥ yā iva saḥ pāsādaḥ hoti yam aham tena samayena ajjhāvasāmi dhammaḥ pāsādaḥ

original: Tesaṁ kho pana, bhikkhu, caturāsītiyā kūṭāgārasahassānaṁ ekaññeva taṁ kūṭāgāraṁ hoti yamahaṁ tena samayena ajjhāvasāmi—mahābyūhaṁ kūṭāgāraṁ.
analyzed: tesam kho pana bhikkhu caturāsītiyā kūṭāgāra sahassānam ekaññā iva tat kūṭāgāram hoti yam aham tena samayena ajjhāvasāmi mahā byūham kūṭāgāra

original: Tesaṁ kho pana, bhikkhu, caturāsītiyā pallaṅkasahassānaṁ ekoyeva so pallaṅko hoti yamahaṁ tena samayena paribhuñjāmi—dantamayo vā sāramayo vā sovaṇṇamayo vā rūpiyamayo vā.
analyzed: tesam kho pana bhikkhu caturāsītiyā pallaṅka sahassānaṃ ekaḥ yā iva saḥ pallaṅkaḥ hoti yam aham tena samayena paribhuñjāmi danta mayaḥ vā sāra mayaḥ vā sovaṇṇa mayaḥ vā rūpiya mayaḥ vā

original: Tesaṁ kho pana, bhikkhu, caturāsītiyā nāgasahassānaṁ ekoyeva so nāgo hoti yamahaṁ tena samayena abhiruhāmi—uposatho nāgarājā.
analyzed: tesam kho pana bhikkhu caturāsītiyā nāga sahassānaṃ ekaḥ yā iva saḥ nāgaḥ hoti yam aham tena samayena abhiruhāmi uposathaḥ nāga rājā

original: Tesaṁ kho pana, bhikkhu, caturāsītiyā assasahassānaṁ ekoyeva so asso hoti yamahaṁ tena samayena abhiruhāmi—valāhako assarājā.
analyzed: tesam kho pana bhikkhu caturāsītiyāḥ assa sahassānaṃ ekaḥ yā iva saḥ assaḥ hoti yam aham tena samayena abhiruhāmi valāhakaḥ assa rājā

original: Tesaṁ kho pana, bhikkhu, caturāsītiyā rathasahassānaṁ ekoyeva so ratho hoti yamahaṁ tena samayena abhiruhāmi—vejayanto ratho.
analyzed: tesam kho pana bhikkhu caturāsītiyāḥ ratha sahassānaṃ ekaḥ yā iva saḥ rathaḥ hoti yam aham tena samayena rathaḥ

original: Tesaṁ kho pana, bhikkhu, caturāsītiyā itthisahassānaṁ ekāyeva sā itthī hoti yā maṁ tena samayena paccupaṭṭhāti—khattiyānī vā velāmikā vā.
analyzed: tesam kho pana bhikkhu caturāsītiyāḥ itthi sahassānaṃ ekāyā iva sā itthī hoti yā mam tena samayena paccupaṭṭhā atikhattiyānī vā velāmikā vā

original: Tesaṁ kho pana, bhikkhu, caturāsītiyā vatthakoṭisahassānaṁ ekaññeva taṁ vatthayugaṁ
analyzed: tesam kho pana bhikkhu caturāsītiyāḥ vattha koṭi sahassānam ekaññā iva tam vattha yuga

original: hoti yamahaṁ tena samayena paridahāmi—khomasukhumaṁ vā koseyyasukhumaṁ vā kambalasukhumaṁ
analyzed: yam aham tena samayena paridahāmi khoma sukhumam vā koseyya sukhumam vā kambala sukhuma

original: Tesaṁ kho pana, bhikkhu, caturāsītiyā thālipākasahassānaṁ ekoyeva so thālipāko hoti yato nāḷikodanaparamaṁ bhuñjāmi tadupiyañca sūpeyyaṁ.
analyzed: tesam kho pana bhikkhu caturāsītiyā thālipāka sahassānam eko yā iva saḥ thālipākaḥ hoti yatas nāḷika udana paramam bhuñjāmi tat upiyam ca sūpeyya

original: Iti kho, bhikkhu, sabbe te saṅkhārā atītā niruddhā vipariṇatā.
analyzed: iti kho bhikkhu sabbe te saṅkhārāḥ atītāḥ niruddhāḥ vipariṇatā
evam an assāsikā kho bhikkhu saṅkhārā

original: Yāvañcidaṁ, bhikkhu, alameva sabbasaṅkhāresu nibbindituṁ, alaṁ virajjituṁ, alaṁ vimuccitun”ti.
analyzed: yāvañcida bhikkhu alam eva sabba saṅkhāresu nibbinditu alam virajjitu alam vimuccitu nti

original: Ekamantaṁ nisinno kho so bhikkhu bhagavantaṁ etadavoca:
analyzed: ekamantam nisinnaḥ kho saḥ bhikkhu bhagavantam etat avoca

original: “atthi nu kho, bhante, kiñci rūpaṁ yaṁ rūpaṁ niccaṁ dhuvaṁ sassataṁ avipariṇāmadhammaṁ sassatisamaṁ tatheva ṭhassati?
analyzed: atthi nu kho bhante kiñci rūpam yat rūpam niccam dhuvam sassatam a vipariṇāma dhammam sassati samam tathā iva

original: Atthi nu kho, bhante, kāci vedanā yā vedanā niccā dhuvā sassatā avipariṇāmadhammā sassatisamaṁ tatheva ṭhassati?
analyzed: atthi nu kho bhante kāci vedanā yā vedanā niccā dhuvā sassatā a vipariṇāma dhammā sassati samam tathā iva ṭhassati

original: Atthi nu kho, bhante, kāci saññā …pe…
analyzed: atthi nu kho bhante kāci saññā pe

original: keci saṅkhārā, ye saṅkhārā niccā dhuvā sassatā avipariṇāmadhammā sassatisamaṁ tatheva ṭhassanti?
analyzed: keci saṅkhārāḥ ye saṅkhārāḥ niccāḥ dhuvāḥ sassatāḥ a vipariṇāma dhammāḥ sassati samam tathā iva

original: Atthi nu kho, bhante, kiñci viññāṇaṁ, yaṁ viññāṇaṁ niccaṁ dhuvaṁ sassataṁ avipariṇāmadhammaṁ sassatisamaṁ tatheva ṭhassatī”ti?
analyzed: atthi nu kho bhante kiñci viññāṇa yat viññāṇam niccam dhuvam sassatam a vipariṇāma dhammam sassati samam tathā iva ṭhassati iti

original: “Natthi kho, bhikkhu, kiñci rūpaṁ, yaṁ rūpaṁ niccaṁ dhuvaṁ sassataṁ avipariṇāmadhammaṁ sassatisamaṁ tatheva ṭhassati.
analyzed: natthi kho bhikkhu kiñci yat rūpam niccam dhuvam sassatam a vipariṇāma dhammam sassati samam tathā iva

original: kiñci viññāṇaṁ, yaṁ viññāṇaṁ niccaṁ dhuvaṁ sassataṁ avipariṇāmadhammaṁ sassatisamaṁ tatheva ṭhassatī”ti.
analyzed: yam viññāṇam niccam dhuvam sassatam a vipariṇāma dhammam sassati samam tathā iva

original: Atha kho bhagavā parittaṁ nakhasikhāyaṁ paṁsuṁ āropetvā taṁ bhikkhuṁ etadavoca:

analyzed: yasmā ca kho bhikkhu ettakā api saṅkhārā na atthi niccā dhuvā sassatā a vipariṇāma dhammā tasmā brahmacariya vāsaḥ paññāyati sammā dukkha kkhayāya

analyzed: ye hi keci bhikkhave samaṇāḥ vā brāhmaṇāḥ vā imesam pañcannam upādānakkhandhānam samudayañca atthaṅgamañca assādañca ādīnavañca nissaraṇañca yathābhūtam na pajānanti pe

original: pajānanti, sayaṁ abhiññā sacchikatvā upasampajja viharantī”ti.
analyzed: pajānanti sayam abhiññā sacchikatvā upasampajja viharanti iti
seyyathidaṃ rūpa upādānakkhandho pe viññāṇa upādānakkhandho

original: Yato kho, bhikkhave, ariyasāvako imesaṁ pañcannaṁ upādānakkhandhānaṁ samudayañca atthaṅgamañca assādañca ādīnavañca nissaraṇañca yathābhūtaṁ pajānāti.
analyzed: yatas kho bhikkhave ariya sāvakaḥ imesam pañcannam upādānakkhandhānam samudayañca atthaṅgamañca assādañca ādīnavañca nissaraṇañca yathābhūtam pajānāti

original: Ayaṁ vuccati, bhikkhave, ariyasāvako sotāpanno avinipātadhammo niyato sambodhiparāyano”ti.
analyzed: ayam vuccati bhikkhave ariya sāvako sotāpannaḥ a vinipāta dhammaḥ niyataḥ sambodhi parāyanaḥ ti
seyyathidaṃ rūpa upādānakkhandho pe viññāṇa upādānakkhandho

original: Yato kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu imesaṁ pañcannaṁ upādānakkhandhānaṁ samudayañca atthaṅgamañca assādañca ādīnavañca nissaraṇañca yathābhūtaṁ viditvā anupādāvimutto hoti.
analyzed: yatas kho bhikkhave bhikkhu imesam pañcannam upādānakkhandhānam samudayañca atthaṅgamañca assādañca ādīnavañca nissaraṇañca yathābhūtam viditvā an upādā vimuttaḥ hoti

original: Ayaṁ vuccati, bhikkhave, bhikkhu arahaṁ khīṇāsavo vusitavā katakaraṇīyo ohitabhāro anuppattasadattho parikkhīṇabhavasaṁyojano sammadaññāvimutto”ti.
analyzed: ayam vuccati bhikkhave bhikkhu araham khīṇa āsavaḥ vusitavā kata karaṇīyaḥ ohita bhāraḥ an uppatta sadattho parikkhīṇa bhava sayojanaḥ sammadaññā vimutto ti

original: “Rūpe, bhikkhave, yo chando yo rāgo yā nandī yā taṇhā, taṁ pajahatha.
analyzed: rūpe bhikkhave yaḥ chandaḥ yaḥ rāgaḥ yā nandī yā taṇhā tam pajahatha

original: Evaṁ taṁ rūpaṁ pahīnaṁ bhavissati ucchinnamūlaṁ tālāvatthukataṁ anabhāvaṅkataṁ āyatiṁ anuppādadhammaṁ.
analyzed: evam tam rūpam pahīnam bhavissati ucchinna mūlam tālāvatthukatam anabhāvaṅkatam āyatim an uppāda dhamma

original: viññāṇe yo chando yo rāgo yā nandī yā taṇhā, taṁ pajahatha.

original: Evaṁ taṁ viññāṇaṁ pahīnaṁ bhavissati ucchinnamūlaṁ tālāvatthukataṁ anabhāvaṅkataṁ āyatiṁ anuppādadhamman”ti.

original: Evaṁ taṁ rūpaṁ pahīnaṁ bhavissati ucchinnamūlaṁ …pe…

original: Sīlavatāvuso, koṭṭhika, bhikkhunā ime pañcupādānakkhandhā aniccato dukkhato rogato gaṇḍato sallato aghato ābādhato parato palokato suññato anattato yoniso manasi kātabbā.

original: Ṭhānaṁ kho panetaṁ, āvuso, vijjati yaṁ sīlavā bhikkhu ime pañcupādānakkhandhe aniccato …pe… anattato yoniso manasi karonto sotāpattiphalaṁ sacchikareyyā”ti.
analyzed: ṭhānam kho pana itas āvuso vijjati yat sīlavā bhikkhu ime pañca upādāna khandhe aniccataḥ pe anattataḥ yonisas manasi karontaḥ sotāpatti phalam sacchikareyya ati

original: “Sotāpannena panāvuso sāriputta, bhikkhunā katame dhammā yoniso manasi kātabbā”ti?
analyzed: sotāpannena pana āvuso sāriputta bhikkhunā katame dhammā yonisas manasi kātabbā ati

original: “Sotāpannenapi kho, āvuso koṭṭhika, bhikkhunā ime pañcupādānakkhandhā aniccato …pe… anattato yoniso manasi kātabbā.

original: Ṭhānaṁ kho panetaṁ, āvuso, vijjati yaṁ sotāpanno bhikkhu ime pañcupādānakkhandhe aniccato …pe… anattato yoniso manasi karonto sakadāgāmiphalaṁ sacchikareyyā”ti.
